T02D1847:145a-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza tantra panytsi k'a n'a ma /
T02D1847:145a-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba /
T02D1847:145a-4: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1847:145b-0: gang las @145b yang dag skyes pa rtog pa'i dra ba kun bral bde bar gshegs pa rnams /
T02D1847:145b-1: chos sku rtag pa yon tan dang ldan so so rang gis rig bya mnyam med pa /
T02D1847:145b-2: sems can don phyir tha dad gzugs dang longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i skur ldan pa /
T02D1847:145b-3: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin nges par byang sems bdud rtsi de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1847:145b-4: padma dang ni sku med rol pa bzhad pas mdzad dang chos kyi myu gu'i gzhung //
T02D1847:145b-5: mgrin gsum dang ni dbang po'i dbyangs snyan skyong las byung dang snying po sbas pas bshad //
T02D1847:145b-6: dpal ldan dus la gang du gsal tshig bshes gnyen ye shes kyis mdzad gzhan yang ste //
T02D1847:145b-7: rdo rje slob dpon brgyud pa las ni 'ongs pa de las bdag ni blo dman no //
T02D1847:145b-8: 'on kyang dpal sde dang ni byis pa nas skyes pa dang sman pa la sogs pa //
T02D1847:145b-9: dpal ldan ye shes zhabs kyi lam la 'jug pa rnams kyis mang du ni //
T02D1847:145b-10: rgyas par byas pas gyur pa gang yin de yi gzhung lugs de nyid ni //
T02D1847:145b-11: de ni 'di ru mdo ru bsdus pa 'grol la phan phyir brjod par bya //
T02D1847:145b-12: thams cad du rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams dgos pa rtogs te 'jug go //
T02D1847:145b-13: thabs kyang shes shing goms par byed pas 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te /
T02D1847:145b-14: mdo 'chad pa rnams kyis dang por 'jug pa'i yan
T02D1847:145b-15: lag tu gyur pa rjes su mthun pa'i thabs dang
T02D1847:145b-16: / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i mtshan nyid dgos pa des par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1847:145b-17: de yang 'brel pa la sogs pa ma bstan par
T02D1847:145b-18: bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir don gyis 'brel pa
T02D1847:145b-19: la sogs pa yang bstan par bya ste /
T02D1847:145b-20: de la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1847:145b-21: rgyu mthun pa chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D1847:145b-22: sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin thugs dang gsung dang sku'i
T02D1847:145b-23: rigs so sor rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyer de
T02D1847:145b-24: lta ba ngan pa rnams la sbas pa'i phyir gsang
T02D1847:145b-25: ba'o // gang du de'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin
T02D1847:145b-26: gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa ni bcom
T02D1847:145b-27: ldan 'das gsang ba 'dus pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1847:145b-28: rdo rje ste mi phyed kyang bi ra na'i stan
T02D1847:145b-29: du brjod pa lta bur brjod do //
T02D1847:145b-30: gang yang bco brgyad las gsungs pa /
T02D1847:146a-0: sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa @146a * //
T02D1847:146a-2: gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin //
T02D1847:146a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba //
T02D1847:146a-4: tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par brjod //
T02D1847:146a-6: de ltar gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag
T02D1847:146a-7: nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs gsum gyi ting
T02D1847:146a-8: nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa la
T02D1847:146a-9: sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni brjod par bya'o //
T02D1847:146a-10: de rtogs par byed pa'i phyir rgyud las yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1847:146a-11: sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i snyan dngags su bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1847:146a-12: de bzhin du yang dpal sde'i zhal snga nas gsungs
T02D1847:146a-13: pa 'di rnams rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid de
T02D1847:146a-14: / nyi shu lnga'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor pa gang de gleng gzhi'i le'u gsungs pa ni /
T02D1847:146a-15: byang chub sems sogs kyis ni kun 'grub pa //
T02D1847:146a-16: 'di ni brjod par bya ba nyid yin la //
T02D1847:146a-17: sgra yi bdag nyid rjod par byed pa'i rgyud //
T02D1847:146a-19: brjod par bya ba dang rjod bar byed pa 'di dag ni /
T02D1847:146a-20: brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa'o //
T02D1847:146a-21: dgos pa yang gdul bya rnams kyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1847:146a-22: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa sngon
T02D1847:146a-23: du song ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs
T02D1847:146a-24: pa sngon du song pa'i thos pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1847:146a-25: rim pas sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa mngon du
T02D1847:146a-26: byed pa khyad par can ston par byed pas yongs
T02D1847:146a-27: su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i ngo bo 'gro
T02D1847:146a-28: ba ma lus pas brten par bya ba zag pa
T02D1847:146a-29: med pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid mngon du byed pa'o
T02D1847:146a-31: lha thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:146a-32: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa de nyid bcu bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:146a-33: bstan bcos gang zhig don mang ldan //
T02D1847:146a-34: lha rnams thams cad brtag pa yin //
T02D1847:146a-35: de yi rgyud ni rgyud yin brjod //
T02D1847:146a-38: lha thams cad kyi de nyid kyang bcu drug pa las khong du chud par bya ste /
T02D1847:146a-39: rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa //
T02D1847:146a-40: dbus su gzugs ni legs bris pas //
T02D1847:146a-42: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes //
T02D1847:146b-1: ci'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na /
T02D1847:146b-3: 'di ltar thams cad thams cad du rang gi dbang
T02D1847:146b-4: gis bdag nyid bde bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rab
T02D1847:146b-5: tu 'jug ste / 'di ltar yang blang bar bya
T02D1847:146b-6: ba dang dor bar bya ba'i khyad par mi shes
T02D1847:146b-7: nas mu stegs rnams ni re zhig lha dang mi
T02D1847:146b-8: la sogs pa'i bde ba cung zad tsam la shin
T02D1847:146b-9: tu 'dod pa'i sems kyis chu dang me la sogs
T02D1847:146b-10: pa rnams su bdag 'jug par byed do //
T02D1847:146b-11: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyang dngos po'i rang
T02D1847:146b-12: bzhin mi shes te phung po med pa mchog tu
T02D1847:146b-13: bde bar shes nas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'da'
T02D1847:146b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la mdzes pa'i
T02D1847:146b-16: ngang tshul can yang sbyin pa la sogs pa la
T02D1847:146b-17: 'jug pa na thams cad rtag tu stong pa nyid
T02D1847:146b-18: du ro gcig pas sa thob pa yang snying rje
T02D1847:146b-19: dman pas theg pa dman pa la 'dod par byed
T02D1847:146b-20: do // de yang rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pa /
T02D1847:146b-21: sa thob pa ni rgyal ba'i sras //
T02D1847:146b-22: yid ches par ni mi 'gyur te //
T02D1847:146b-23: ji srid sa brgyad pa yi bar //
T02D1847:146b-24: theg pa dman pas de rnams 'jigs //
T02D1847:146b-26: gang zhugs rgyal ba dag las skyes //
T02D1847:146b-27: yid ches par ni 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1847:146b-28: theg pa che la gcig tu gnas //
T02D1847:146b-30: pha rol tu phyin pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i
T02D1847:146b-31: mthar thug pa thob pas kyang sangs rgyas ma yin
T02D1847:146b-32: te / sa bcu pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:146b-33: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
T02D1847:146b-34: zab mo'i don mngon du byas pas der sems can gyi don dang bral pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:146b-35: 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan pa'i mchog nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'dod do //
T02D1847:146b-36: bdag med pa mthar thug par 'jug pa na yang bdag med pas thob par mi nus te /
T02D1847:146b-37: de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:146b-39: thabs dang bral ba dngos med tsam //
T02D1847:146b-40: bsgrub par bya ba yin na yang //
T02D1847:146b-41: bdag gzhan don la de mthu med //
T02D1847:147a-3: thabs dang bcas pas kyang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1847:147a-5: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i 'dod chags chen po'i ngo
T02D1847:147a-6: bo nyid kyis nye bar ston pa rdzogs pa'i phyir
T02D1847:147a-8: rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las /
T02D1847:147a-9: 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag / bde ba chen po nor chen po //
T02D1847:147a-10: khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas ni //
T02D1847:147a-11: don byed de ni bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:147a-14: sangs rgyas nyid ni sgrub pa'i rgyu //
T02D1847:147a-15: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor kun du yang //
T02D1847:147a-17: kun du mthong ba ma yin nam //
T02D1847:147a-18: de yang gsungs pa thams cad gsang ba las //
T02D1847:147a-19: sangs rgyas nyid kyang mdor bsdus //
T02D1847:147a-21: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma rtogs pa //
T02D1847:147a-22: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor pas mi thob //
T02D1847:147a-24: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid do //
T02D1847:147a-25: gang gsungs pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:147a-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02D1847:147a-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid gnas //
T02D1847:147a-28: 'di las sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1847:147a-29: gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ma yin //
T02D1847:147a-31: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1847:147a-32: ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas /
T02D1847:147a-33: de phyir kun du rtog bsal cing //
T02D1847:147a-35: kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid du //
T02D1847:147a-36: bsgom pa nyid kyi byang chub snod //
T02D1847:147a-38: gzhan yang snang ba med pa'i ye shes mngon du
T02D1847:147a-39: byas pas sangs rgyas nyid du khas len par byed
T02D1847:147a-40: la / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
T02D1847:147a-41: rtag tu bsod nams de'i rnam par smin pa ni bde ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:147a-43: snang ba'i rdo rje 'char ba las //
T02D1847:147a-44: 'bras bu bde ster bsod nams yin //
T02D1847:147a-45: de ni 'gog phyir don med do //
T02D1847:147a-46: bsod nams kyis ni bde ba thob //
T02D1847:147a-47: bde bas bsod nams thob pa yin //
T02D1847:147a-48: byang chub sems las skyes pa'i phyir //
T02D1847:147b-0: @147b de yi bsod nams mkha' dang mnyam //
T02D1847:147b-2: de'i phyir byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis
T02D1847:147b-3: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen
T02D1847:147b-4: po'i ngo bo rdzogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag
T02D1847:147b-5: nyid ngo bo nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1847:147b-8: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i gnas //
T02D1847:147b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byung ba //
T02D1847:147b-10: de ni chos rnams chos nyid do //
T02D1847:147b-12: yang rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pa //
T02D1847:147b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang //
T02D1847:147b-14: byang chub sems kyang bstan pa gang //
T02D1847:147b-16: de bzhin nyid kyang mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1847:147b-18: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis kyang
T02D1847:147b-19: rgyud nas byang chub sgrub par byed pa rdo rje
T02D1847:147b-20: 'dzin pa'i ngo bo'i sgrub thabs 'dir 'jug par shes
T02D1847:147b-21: par bya'o // bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang bde bar bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
T02D1847:147b-22: de las rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:147b-23: 'on kyang sgro btags pa las byung bas yun ring por gnas pa ma yin no //
T02D1847:147b-24: 'di ltar phyi rol du mngon par zhen pas bslad
T02D1847:147b-25: pa'i yid kyis bris sku la sogs pa'i lha'i stobs
T02D1847:147b-26: kyis dngos grub rdzogs nas bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1847:147b-27: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la khyab par yang 'di yin te /
T02D1847:147b-28: de'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D1847:147b-29: sngon du song ba'i bris sku la sogs pa dmigs
T02D1847:147b-30: pas 'dra ba'i dngos grub kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro
T02D1847:147b-33: re zhig thang ka la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje snyems pa bris te /
T02D1847:147b-34: de'i mdun du rang phyag rgya chen po la gnas
T02D1847:147b-35: nas 'bum bzlas te 'bum rdzogs nas rdo rje sems
T02D1847:147b-36: dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1847:147b-37: pa'o // rnal 'byor bla mar yang dam pa'i bde ba bsgrub par bya bar 'dod de /
T02D1847:147b-38: 'on kyang 'dir de'i rgyu'i gtso bo dngos su ma bshad do //
T02D1847:148a-0: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gtso bo nyid kyi bsgrub par nus pa thabs dang shes @148a * //
T02D1847:148a-1: rab gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag
T02D1847:148a-2: las mchog gi skyes bu'i don la mkho ba zag
T02D1847:148a-3: pa med pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1847:148a-4: pa chen po nyid rdzogs pa'i phyir thun mong ma
T02D1847:148a-5: yin pa'i rgyu nye bar bstan pa 'di ni bla
T02D1847:148a-6: na med pa'o // ji ltar bsgrub par nus par 'gyur zhe na brjod par bya ste /
T02D1847:148a-7: yul la nye bar longs spyod pa legs par goms
T02D1847:148a-8: pa rnams dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod
T02D1847:148a-10: sngags la sogs pas legs par sbyangs pa'i dug la
T02D1847:148a-11: nye bar longs spyod pa bzhin phan pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1847:148a-12: skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:148a-13: de yang gsungs pa bdun pa las /
T02D1847:148a-14: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas //
T02D1847:148a-16: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02D1847:148a-19: mdo don 'chad pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D1847:148a-20: dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas dang //
T02D1847:148a-21: tshig don bcas dang mtshams sbyar bcas //
T02D1847:148a-22: brgal lan bcas par bsnyad par bya //
T02D1847:148a-23: zhes bya ba la re zhig 'di'i dgos pa ni smras zin to //
T02D1847:148a-24: 'di'i bsdus don ni ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i kun du bzang po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1847:148a-25: le'u so so'i rim pa'i rgyud dang brgal ba la
T02D1847:148a-26: sogs pa yang ji ltar srid pa bzhin du bstan
T02D1847:148a-27: par bya'o // 'phral du tshig gi don gyi bshad pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D1847:148a-28: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:148a-29: 'dir sdud pa po ni rdo rje chos yin par brjod de /
T02D1847:148a-30: de nyid la rgyud 'di gtso bor yang dag par gtad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:148a-31: de yang le'u bcu bdun pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1847:148a-32: khyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di
T02D1847:148a-33: bsgo bar gyis shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1847:148a-34: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di
T02D1847:148a-35: bsgom par gyis shig ces bya ba nas /
T02D1847:148a-37: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1847:148a-38: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid zung shig /
T02D1847:148a-39: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
T02D1847:148a-40: kyi dbang phrug gi rgyal po zhes bya bar dbang
T02D1847:148a-41: bskur ro // de nyid kyi phyir phyag na rdo
T02D1847:148b-0: rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud la sogs @148b par spyir
T02D1847:148b-1: bstan pa gtad pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D1847:148b-2: pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku dang dam pa'i
T02D1847:148b-3: chos kyi tshogs srung ba la dbang yang phyag na
T02D1847:148b-4: rdo rje sdud pa po ma yin no //
T02D1847:148b-5: gal te chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i sgras phyag na rdo rje nyid ces brjod na /
T02D1847:148b-6: de'i tshe 'dir de nyid sdud pa por 'gyur ro //
T02D1847:148b-8: rdo rje chos nyid la dpal gsang ba 'dus pa
T02D1847:148b-9: nyan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T02D1847:148b-10: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don du zhus pa'o
T02D1847:148b-11: // rgyud thams cad kyi don dang gzhung sems la bzung nas /
T02D1847:148b-12: 'di skad ces bya ba ni nges pa'i don du
T02D1847:148b-13: brjod pas rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pas
T02D1847:148b-14: bzung ba'i mdo don ma lus pa bstan pa'i ched
T02D1847:148b-15: du 'di skad ces bya bas phyin ci ma log
T02D1847:148b-17: bdag gis zhes bya ba 'dis bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du thob pa'o //
T02D1847:148b-18: bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das las gzhung dang don mngon sum du bzung ba ste /
T02D1847:148b-19: gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa ma yin no //
T02D1847:148b-20: bdag gis byas pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1847:148b-21: 'on kyang 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur pa'i gzhung las /
T02D1847:148b-23: bdag gis zhes bya bas mi ldan pa rnam par
T02D1847:148b-24: bcad pa ste grangs las 'das pa'i 'khor 'chad par
T02D1847:148b-25: 'gyur bas so // yang na bdag gis zhes bya
T02D1847:148b-26: ba ni bdag mos pa'i dbang gis bdag gis 'di
T02D1847:148b-27: skad re zhig thos kyi gzhan gyis ni gzhan du
T02D1847:148b-28: 'gyur bas so // thos pa'o // gdul bya'i bye
T02D1847:148b-29: brag gis rjes su mthun pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D1847:148b-30: 'gyur bas so // thos pa'o // kyis gsungs pa'o // gang yang slob dpon ma khol gyis /
T02D1847:148b-31: gsung gcig gis ni bstan mod kyi //
T02D1847:148b-32: du ma nyid du rtogs par byed //
T02D1847:148b-33: bdag la nye bar ston to zhes //
T02D1847:148b-34: skye bo kun gyi dus shes par 'gyur //
T02D1847:148b-36: thos pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i dus su bdag byang chub sems dpar smras la /
T02D1847:148b-37: dis na sdud pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bstan te /
T02D1847:148b-38: thos pa zhes pa dang 'gal ba med do //
T02D1847:148b-39: gang yang gsang ba 'dus pa la ston pa'i dus
T02D1847:148b-40: dang nye ba na bco brgyad pa las mthong zhing
T02D1847:149a-1: khong du chud pa zhes pa 'dis yang dag par
T02D1847:149a-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bstan pa de ni rigs
T02D1847:149a-3: pa'o // 'di ltar yang mngon sum du thos pa dang /
T02D1847:149a-4: rgyud kyi don ma lus par nges par 'dzin pa'i
T02D1847:149a-5: phyir yang sdud pa po bdag nyid tshad ma nyid
T02D1847:149a-7: slob dpon med par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa dang /
T02D1847:149a-8: nges par rtogs par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1847:149a-9: 'di ltar gleng bslang ba byas nas sdud pa'i dus
T02D1847:149a-10: su nye ba ma yin pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro
T02D1847:149a-11: ba yid ches par bya ba'i don du gang gi
T02D1847:149a-12: tshe gang las gang du gang dang lhan cig thos

T02D1847:149a-14: dus gcig na zhes bya ba 'dis bdag nyid thos

T02D1847:149a-16: te / bdag gis lan cig nyid du thos kyi /
T02D1847:149a-17: gzhan du gzhan yang thos te /
T02D1847:149a-18: de lta bur gyur pa ni rtag tu ston pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:149a-19: 'di'i bsam pa yang dus thams cad du 'di 'dra
T02D1847:149a-20: ba rmad du byung ba'i chos nyan pa mi srid
T02D1847:149a-21: pa'i phyir khyed rnams kyis 'dir gus par bya'o zhes
T02D1847:149a-22: so // gcig kyang nyan pa'i dus na rgyun mi
T02D1847:149a-23: 'chad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis nyan pa rgyun mi
T02D1847:149a-25: gzhan du na yi ge dang /
T02D1847:149a-27: ngag 'dzin pa'i dus tha dad pa'i phyir ji ltar dus gcig tu 'gyur /
T02D1847:149a-28: yang na skad cig ni dus gcig ste /
T02D1847:149a-29: skad cig ma nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis sam /
T02D1847:149a-30: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
T02D1847:149a-31: thob pas rgyud thams cad kyi don snang ba'i phyir
T02D1847:149a-32: ro // dus zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba
T02D1847:149a-33: yin pa la dus tshod smos pas ni dus ni
T02D1847:149a-34: rdzas ma yin par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:149a-35: nyi ma la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di'i 'gro ba'i
T02D1847:149a-36: khyad par skad cig ma la sogs pa'i brdas brjod
T02D1847:149a-37: de / dus zhes bya ba'i rdzas ci yang yod pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1847:149a-38: gang las thos she na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:149a-39: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa thams
T02D1847:149a-40: cad kyi gnyen po bla na med pa'i shes rab
T02D1847:149a-42: 'di gang la yod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1847:149a-43: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:149a-45: 'joms pa'i phyir na bcom pa ste /
T02D1847:149b-0: @149b nyon mongs bdud la sogs 'joms pas //
T02D1847:149b-1: shes rab nyon mongs de 'joms phyir //
T02D1847:149b-2: de phyir shes rab bcom par bshad //
T02D1847:149b-5: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02D1847:149b-6: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02D1847:149b-7: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
T02D1847:149b-8: drug po de la ldan zhes brjod //
T02D1847:149b-9: ces bya ba 'di dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1847:149b-10: 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes
T02D1847:149b-11: shar bas nyon mongs pa'i gzhan dbang med pa'i phyir
T02D1847:149b-12: dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa nyid do //
T02D1847:149b-13: me long lta bu'i ye shes thob pas blta bas
T02D1847:149b-14: chog mi shes pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ston pa'i
T02D1847:149b-15: phyir dang / 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1847:149b-16: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1847:149b-17: pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
T02D1847:149b-18: zhes pa la sogs pa'i grags pa thob pas gzugs
T02D1847:149b-19: phun sum tshogs pa dang grags pa dang yang ldan
T02D1847:149b-20: phyir dang / pa'o // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1847:149b-21: shes mthar phyin pa yon tan thams cad kyi rten
T02D1847:149b-22: yin pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin 'gro ba
T02D1847:149b-23: ma lus pa'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin pa'i phyir
T02D1847:149b-24: phyir dang / pa'o // dpal ldan no // so
T02D1847:149b-25: sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pas shes bya'i sgrib
T02D1847:149b-26: pa la sogs pa shin tu bsal nas don ma
T02D1847:149b-27: lus pa'i snang ba'i ye shes thob pa ni ye
T02D1847:149b-29: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thob pas thams cad
T02D1847:149b-30: nyid sgrub par byed pa ni brtson 'grus dang ldan
T02D1847:149b-31: pa'o // gzhan la de lta bu'i yon tan yod
T02D1847:149b-32: pa ma yin pa 'di ltar gyur pas brjod pas
T02D1847:149b-33: phyin ci ma log par gyur pa'o //
T02D1847:149b-34: bcu bdun pa'i mthar 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya bar 'chad par 'gyur te /
T02D1847:149b-35: de nyid kyi phyir de nyid las thos so zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1847:149b-36: 'dis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02D1847:149b-37: gang du gnas nas thos she na /
T02D1847:149b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D1847:149b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1847:149b-40: de bzhin nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1847:149b-41: ngo bo de'i bdag nyid du gshegs pa ni de
T02D1847:149b-42: bzhin gshegs pa ste gtsor chos kyi sku bstan to
T02D1847:150a-0: // kun rdzob tu yang sprul pa la @150a * //
T02D1847:150a-1: sogs pa'i gzugs nyid kyis ji ltar rnam grangs gang
T02D1847:150a-2: gis 'jig rten pa la snang ba'i dngos po de
T02D1847:150a-3: nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1847:150a-4: kyis gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang yongs su spyod
T02D1847:150a-6: yongs su gsung pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /

T02D1847:150a-9: bya ba dang bcas pa lta bur tha snyad byed do //
T02D1847:150a-10: de kho na nyid du ni yul gyi dngos po med pas gang du yang ma gshegs pa'o //
T02D1847:150a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la /
T02D1847:150a-12: thams cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1847:150a-13: de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa yang rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1847:150a-14: nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba yang yin no //
T02D1847:150a-15: de rnams kyi snying po rdo rje ni mi phyed
T02D1847:150a-16: pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o
T02D1847:150a-17: // de nyid dam pa bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dga' ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang //
T02D1847:150a-18: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po 'joms pas btsun mo'i bha ga ste /
T02D1847:150a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1847:150a-20: rang bzhin grangs ji lta ba bzhin du steng dang
T02D1847:150a-21: 'og tu gnyis dang gcig pa ni gru gsum pa'i
T02D1847:150a-22: rnam pa'o // sa bcu gsum pa'i rang bzhin chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1847:150a-23: 'og dang steng du gnyis pa dang /
T02D1847:150a-24: gcig gi gru gsum gyi rnam pa zhes kha cig 'dod do //
T02D1847:150a-26: lnga dang gsum dang gcig gi rigs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1847:150a-27: kyi rang gi ngo bo dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D1847:150a-28: chos 'byung gi nang gi gzhal yas khang du 'dod
T02D1847:150a-29: chags la spyod pa'i gdul bya'i sems can rjes su
T02D1847:150a-30: gzung ba'i ched du 'khor chen po dang bcas pa'i
T02D1847:150a-31: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bzhugs pa dang ldan
T02D1847:150a-32: pa de'i tshe / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1847:150a-34: gnyis su med par mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba las /
T02D1847:150a-35: bha ga bcom ldan sangs rgyas te //
T02D1847:150a-36: de na 'dod chags sun mi dbyung //
T02D1847:150a-37: gang gzhan dam tshig gsum po rnams /
T02D1847:150b-2: 'dir yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1847:150b-3: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin par bshad //
T02D1847:150b-5: de yang gsungs pa bco brgyad pa las /
T02D1847:150b-6: longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1847:150b-7: rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can //
T02D1847:150b-8: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1847:150b-9: gru gsum rnams su bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:150b-10: zhes so// mang po'i tshig ni ston pa'i dus su phyogs bcu na brtan pa dang /
T02D1847:150b-11: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D1847:150b-12: so so'i nang du chud pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1847:150b-13: kyi nang gi gzhal yas khang du dkyil 'khor ba'i
T02D1847:150b-15: rig pa dang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:150b-16: ye shes zhabs kyis kyang 'di'i don kun du bzang
T02D1847:150b-17: po las gru gsum gyen du gnas pa zhes bya
T02D1847:150b-18: ba la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D1847:150b-19: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1847:150b-20: thabs kyis gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'phrog
T02D1847:150b-21: pa dang ldan pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:150b-22: 'dod pa'i khams su 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs
T02D1847:150b-23: pa la lhags par chags pa rjes su gzung ba'i
T02D1847:150b-24: phyir // de lta bu'i gnas su sems ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur te /
T02D1847:150b-25: sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang yang dag pa ji
T02D1847:150b-26: lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par zhes bya
T02D1847:150b-27: ba la / gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02D1847:150b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1847:150b-29: phen [?] pa chen po mdzad pa dang/ dbang po
T02D1847:150b-30: dang bcas par shes par bya ba'i phyir 'khor 'dus
T02D1847:150b-31: pa chen po nye bar bstan par 'dod pas/ brjod
T02D1847:150b-32: kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis lang zhes bya
T02D1847:150b-33: ba gsungs pa ni thams cad las 'das pa grangs
T02D1847:150b-35: des brjod kyis mi lang ba du rnams she na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:150b-36: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1847:150b-37: brjod kyis mi lang ba grangs kyis rnam par bcad
T02D1847:150b-38: par mi nus pa'i phyir brjod kyis mi lang ba'i
T02D1847:150b-39: yang brjod kyis mi lang ba ste /
T02D1847:150b-40: thams cad kyis grangs las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:150b-41: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpe tsam du bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:151a-1: brjod kyis mi lang ba dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
T02D1847:151a-2: ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan dang gzugs dang nus
T02D1847:151a-4: 'dir bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:151a-5: de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten pa'i grangs kyis bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:151a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1847:151a-7: gang yang don dam pa chos kyi rang bzhin gyis
T02D1847:151a-8: brjod bya dang rjod byed las 'das pa'i ngo bo
T02D1847:151a-9: rnam par bshad pa ni der 'dir skabs ma yin
T02D1847:151a-10: pa nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin
T02D1847:151a-11: no // da ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1847:151a-12: kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni ma yin
T02D1847:151a-14: chos kyi dbyings 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kho na'i ma yin pa nyid de /
T02D1847:151a-15: 'on kyang dngos po thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i
T02D1847:151a-16: ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'dis ni byang chub sems
T02D1847:151a-17: dpa'i che ba'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1847:151a-18: chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa
T02D1847:151a-19: las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te de'i zhing ni
T02D1847:151a-20: gang du skye ba bstan pa ste /
T02D1847:151a-21: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1847:151a-22: de mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du chags par grags
T02D1847:151a-23: te / de yang chos mngon pa las /
T02D1847:151a-24: gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang //
T02D1847:151a-25: ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T02D1847:151a-26: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T02D1847:151a-27: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
T02D1847:151a-28: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
T02D1847:151a-29: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //
T02D1847:151a-30: de stong la ni stong gsum ste //
T02D1847:151a-31: mnyam du 'jig cing chags pa yin //
T02D1847:151a-33: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba ni spyi'i
T02D1847:151a-34: tshig las sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bzung ngo
T02D1847:151a-35: // yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so so'i
T02D1847:151a-36: zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams
T02D1847:151a-37: // so // thams cad kyi thams cad du sems
T02D1847:151a-38: can gyi don byed pa la so so'i nus pa
T02D1847:151a-39: la bar chad med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:151a-40: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na 'am /
T02D1847:151a-41: sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ri rab rnams te /
T02D1847:151a-42: de rnams kyi rdul phra rab ni thams cad las phra ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D1847:151a-43: de yang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D1847:151a-44: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
T02D1847:151b-0: de nyid @151b rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs
T02D1847:151b-1: par byang chub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1847:151b-2: // gang yang bco brgyad pa las //
T02D1847:151b-3: mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa //
T02D1847:151b-4: brjod du med dang rtog bral ba //
T02D1847:151b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di //
T02D1847:151b-7: yang de nyid las gsungs pa //
T02D1847:151b-8: mi 'jig skye ba med gang yin //
T02D1847:151b-9: mgon po de nyid yin par brjod //
T02D1847:151b-11: de la sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems te /
T02D1847:151b-12: gang rnams kyi yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:151b-13: bstan pa'i bsam pas sems can gyi phung po chen
T02D1847:151b-14: po'i don byed pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po ste
T02D1847:151b-15: / de rnams dang lhan cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:151b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba yongs su
T02D1847:151b-17: mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir 'dir bstan pa la gtso
T02D1847:151b-19: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa ston pas gang rnams
T02D1847:151b-20: med na lha'i rnal 'byor dang dkyil 'khor mi rdzogs
T02D1847:151b-21: pa dang / lha de dag thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1847:151b-22: nyid du gyur pa rnams las re zhig byang chub
T02D1847:151b-23: sems dpa' rnams dang por gsungs pa /
T02D1847:151b-24: dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:151b-25: dam tshig rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1847:151b-26: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir yid kyi skye mched byin
T02D1847:151b-27: gyis brlab pa 'dir kun du bzang por gsungs so
T02D1847:151b-28: ; / yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig dang //
T02D1847:151b-29: de bzhin zhes bya ba dang po'i tshig las /
T02D1847:151b-30: don yod pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i phyir sgrib ba
T02D1847:151b-31: thams cad rnam par sel ba yin no zhes kha
T02D1847:151b-32: cig 'dod do // sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1847:151b-33: sgras rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rgyu mthun
T02D1847:151b-36: phyag na rdo rje rnams dang //
T02D1847:151b-37: lus la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rang bzhin sku rdo rje la sogs pa yang gsungs so //
T02D1847:151b-38: ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mnyam
T02D1847:151b-39: pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid rin chen
T02D1847:151b-40: bdag po ste / byang chub sems dpar skabs kyi
T02D1847:151b-41: tshig las de'i rgyu mthun pa nam mkha'i snying po'o
T02D1847:151b-42: bdag po ste / // rgyal ba rdo rje zhes
T02D1847:151b-43: bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rgyal
T02D1847:151b-44: ba ni sgrib ba thams cad rnam par sel ba'o
T02D1847:151b-45: bdag po ste / // // de yang dgongs pa las gsungs pa //
T02D1847:151b-46: rig pa'i skyes bu'i rgyu mthun pa//
T02D1847:152a-0: @152a * // kun du dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02D1847:152a-1: sa snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //
T02D1847:152a-2: de bzhin phyag na rdo rje gzhan //
T02D1847:152a-3: rnam snang mdzad dang snang mtha' yas //
T02D1847:152a-4: mi bskyod rgyu mthun gsum 'di rnams //
T02D1847:152a-5: mkha' snying sgrib pa rnams sel nyid //
T02D1847:152a-6: ting 'dzin rgyal ba'i ming dag can //
T02D1847:152a-7: rin chen don grub rgyu mthun pa //
T02D1847:152a-8: dgongs pa las ni bshad pa'o //
T02D1847:152a-10: dam tshig rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i
T02D1847:152a-11: rgyu mtshan ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i kun du
T02D1847:152a-12: bzang po'i sgrub thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas
T02D1847:152a-13: dam tshig rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgras sa'i snying
T02D1847:152a-14: po la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D1847:152a-16: de'i 'dod pa ni sbyar bar dka' ba'i rtog pa
T02D1847:152a-17: skye ba ma gtogs par cung zad kyang dgos pa
T02D1847:152a-18: med de // de gang yang khas mi len no //
T02D1847:152a-19: ye shes zhabs kyi sgrub thabs kyi rim pa nyid
T02D1847:152a-20: kyis rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa ma yin
T02D1847:152a-21: no// la la ni rgyal ba rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1847:152a-22: ba 'dis kun du bzang po dang gshin rje mthar
T02D1847:152a-23: byed la sogs pa ston par byed do //
T02D1847:152a-24: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa rnams kyis
T02D1847:152a-25: bla na med pa'i sku la sogs pa rdzogs la
T02D1847:152a-26: / de yang ting nge 'dzin med par mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1847:152a-27: ting nge 'dzin yang nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba dang bral ba la med do //
T02D1847:152a-28: zhes bstan pa'i phyir dam tshig rdo rje la sogs
T02D1847:152a-29: pa'i sgra 'dis 'di rnams bstan gyi rang gi ming
T02D1847:152a-31: 'byung ba rnams ni 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams

T02D1847:154b-23: chags chen po ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su

T02D1847:155a-11: de mnyes par byed pa'i don du yin te rig

T02D1847:155a-16: bud med kyi gzugs su sprul pa ni rang gi rig sa dang /

T02D1847:155a-31: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs so //

T02D1847:155b-33: gsang ba gsol la sogs las thob //
T02D1847:155b-34: drod ni dkyil 'khor nyid dang ldan //
T02D1847:155b-35: cho ga bzhin du bla mas brtag / dam tshig dam tshig nyid ni thob //
T02D1847:155b-36: dngos grub thams cad kyang ni thob //
T02D1847:155b-37: ces bya ba'i tshig las dam tshig sbyin pa la
T02D1847:155b-38: sogs pas brten pa rnam par sbyang pa'i phyir brtan
T02D1847:155b-39: pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa

T02D1847:155b-42: kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T02D1847:155b-43: rnams kyis mi bskyod pas mi bskyod pa ni bcom
T02D1847:155b-45: btsun mo'i bha ga ni 'di rang snang ba'i padma'o //
T02D1847:156a-0: gru bzhi ni gnyis su med @156a * //
T02D1847:156a-1: pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sangs
T02D1847:156a-2: rgyas dang sangs rgyas ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid
T02D1847:156a-3: kyis phyi rol gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D1847:156a-5: 'od zer sna lnga kun tu khyab //
T02D1847:156a-6: kun nas yongs su zlum por ni //
T02D1847:156a-7: zhes bya bas nang gi 'phar ma bstan to //
T02D1847:156a-8: rdul med pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
T02D1847:156a-9: nyon mongs pa ni dri mar byed pas rdul te /
T02D1847:156a-10: des dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid brjod pa'i sa bon tsam bstan to //
T02D1847:156a-11: de gang yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:156a-12: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la /
T02D1847:156a-13: dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste
T02D1847:156a-14: de'i dkyil 'khor ram dam tshig ster bar byed pa'i
T02D1847:156a-15: phyir ro // de yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:156a-16: dkyil 'khor gzhug cing dbang bskur ba //
T02D1847:156a-17: dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba //
T02D1847:156a-18: gang zhig mdor bsdus gsungs pa ni //
T02D1847:156a-19: dkyil 'khor mkhas pa bdag nyid che ;
T02D1847:156a-21: yang na dam tshig ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1847:156a-22: de las byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:156a-23: la la dag 'dir mi bskyod pa bdag por 'dod pa de ni bden pa ma yin te /
T02D1847:156a-24: 'dir ni sems can rnams 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la zhen pa'i ched du sprul pa yin la /
T02D1847:156a-25: mi bskyod pa sprul pa ni zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can sbyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:156a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1847:156a-27: cad kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir
T02D1847:156a-28: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi sems can thams cad sdud par
T02D1847:156a-29: byed par rigs so zhes so //
T02D1847:156a-30: byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes
T02D1847:156a-31: kyi bdud rtsi yongs su gyur pa las de bzhin
T02D1847:156a-32: gshegs pa thams cad kyis sprul pa'i don to //
T02D1847:156a-33: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis thog ma med pa'i phyir ram /
T02D1847:156a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i yon tan 'byung
T02D1847:156a-35: ba'i rgyu nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D1847:156a-36: kyi rnam pa thob pas gsal ba'o //
T02D1847:156a-37: de'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni sngar gleng gzhi'i 'khor dang mtshungs pa 'am /
T02D1847:156a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid byang
T02D1847:156a-39: chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i phyir bdag po'i rang
T02D1847:156b-0: bzhin no // kha dog du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir @156b sna tshogs gzugs so //
T02D1847:156b-1: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyis snang bar gyur

T02D1847:156b-10: gdan rnams nye bar ston pa na /

T02D1847:156b-13: gsal ba ni gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i phyir me long

T02D1847:156b-17: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po //

T02D1847:156b-21: nas rang gi gdan dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1847:156b-22: pa thams cad kyis khyab pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1847:156b-23: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1847:156b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi ming gi rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi sgrar brjod do //
T02D1847:156b-25: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:156b-26: de nyid bcu bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:156b-27: ltas dang khyab bdag de bzhin rten //
T02D1847:156b-28: rig pa rigs dang sdig pa sel //
T02D1847:156b-29: bde 'byung dang yang skye gnas ni //
T02D1847:156b-30: sngags rnams kyi gsang rten dang yang //
T02D1847:156b-31: ri dang grong dang dam tshig dang //
T02D1847:156b-32: khyim dang grong khyer gzhi dang ni //
T02D1847:156b-34: de rnams yongs su grags pa yin //
T02D1847:156b-36: de yang bsgom par bya ba nyid de las dang
T02D1847:156b-37: po ba rnams kyis goms pa'i don du 'dod do
T02D1847:156b-38: // sems brtan pas yang yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil
T02D1847:156b-39: 'khor du nor med pa'i snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro
T02D1847:156b-40: ba rnams dbang bskur yang nyes pa med do //
T02D1847:157a-2: yid kyis yang dag dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D1847:157a-3: dam pa'i dkyil 'khor bya ba la //
T02D1847:157a-4: bla ma slob ma yon tan lhag / yang dag snying rje'i dbang son pas //
T02D1847:157a-5: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems kyis min //
T02D1847:157a-6: rdzas la sred pas ma yin te //
T02D1847:157a-7: mi brtan rtsom pa po yi yang //
T02D1847:157a-8: gtso bo rnams kyang gnang ma yin //
T02D1847:157a-9: dam tshig phyir yang de ma mthong //
T02D1847:157a-10: don min zhi ba'i phyir yang min //
T02D1847:157a-11: ngal ba 'ba' zhig tu ni zad //
T02D1847:157a-14: mi mkhas pas ni brtags pa'o //
T02D1847:157a-15: yid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba //
T02D1847:157a-16: mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid mthong //
T02D1847:157a-18: bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba la /
T02D1847:157a-19: sems can thams cad ces blta bar bya ste /
T02D1847:157a-20: de dbang bskur ba'i don gyi phyir 'dir sprul pa'o //
T02D1847:157a-21: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa yang dbang ma bskur ba
T02D1847:157a-22: rnams la dam tshig mi bstan pa'i phyir dbang gsungs

T02D1847:157a-24: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:157a-25: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes

T02D1847:157a-28: de yang gsungs pa bco brgyad pa las //

T02D1847:157a-30: dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso //
T02D1847:157a-31: stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa //
T02D1847:157a-32: byang chub sems zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D1847:157a-34: thugs la zhes bya ba ni thugs ka'i rdo rje
T02D1847:157a-35: lte ba la rgyal ba rnam pa lnga dbang bskur

T02D1847:157a-38: dbang bskur ba ni bcu bdun pa las /

T02D1847:157a-41: pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

T02D1847:157a-44: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:157a-45: de nas zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1847:157a-46: yang dag par gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba'i
T02D1847:157b-0: mthar thug ba'i tshig gnyis @157b pas gsol ba gdab
T02D1847:157b-2: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang 'brel

T02D1847:157b-4: pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gang las mngon par te /

T02D1847:157b-11: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid dbyangs dang gsal
T02D1847:157b-12: byed las 'byung ba zla ba gnyis kyi gzugs mngon
T02D1847:157b-13: du byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1847:157b-16: sra zhing brtan la khong stong min //
T02D1847:157b-17: mi chod pa dang mi phyed mtshan //
T02D1847:157b-18: mi tshig ba dang mi 'jigs pas //
T02D1847:157b-19: stong nyid rdo rje zhes byar brjod //
T02D1847:157b-22: nyes byed thams cad gcod byed pa //
T02D1847:157b-23: byang chub sems gang rdo rje ste //
T02D1847:157b-26: yang na thams cad de nyid kyi rnam pa la
T02D1847:157b-27: mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad stong pa
T02D1847:157b-28: nyid du ro gcig pas byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D1847:157b-31: gang dang gang gi dngos po las /

T02D1847:157b-33: de bzhin nyid mthong 'brel pa ni //
T02D1847:157b-34: thams cad rigs pas de bzhin gshegs //

T02D1847:157b-37: kya rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba
T02D1847:157b-38: ni de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig las

T02D1847:157b-41: de gad la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:157b-42: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gyur ba gsungs pa /
T02D1847:157b-43: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1847:157b-44: yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgom ste //
T02D1847:157b-45: rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:158a-1: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang gi yul lo //
T02D1847:158a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:158a-3: dbyangs dang gsal byed las zla ba gnyis kyi ngo
T02D1847:158a-4: bo nyid kyis gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to

T02D1847:158a-17: zla pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1847:158a-18: byang chub zla ba gnyis pa'o //
T02D1847:158a-19: 'dir yang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams //
T02D1847:158a-20: ka sogs gzugs kyis yang dag 'jug / ces so //

T02D1847:158a-22: to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshig lnga pa gsungs
T02D1847:158a-23: pa / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1847:158a-25: thams cad ces bya ba ni gang dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa'o //
T02D1847:158a-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D1847:158a-28: mchog gi dbang bskur ba thob pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1847:158a-29: pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba

T02D1847:158a-31: pa 'am ; de'i rgyu thob pas so //
T02D1847:158a-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:158a-33: de nas zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1847:158a-34: yang dag par gzigs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshig gsum pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1847:158a-35: de nas zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis gcig gi dngos por gyur pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1847:158a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la sku
T02D1847:158a-37: rdo rje la sogs pa yang yin te de rnams
T02D1847:158a-38: kyi dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
T02D1847:158a-40: gang gi phyir h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje nor
T02D1847:158a-41: bu dmar po dang 'dra ba de nyid kyi rdo
T02D1847:158b-0: gang la ting nge 'dzin de mngon du byed @158b pa ste /
T02D1847:158b-1: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:158b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1847:158b-4: rdo rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa //
T02D1847:158b-5: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1847:158b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
T02D1847:158b-8: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1847:158b-9: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs //
T02D1847:158b-10: zhes bya ba ni rig pa ni shes rab ste de dang lhan cig pa'o //

T02D1847:158b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sngags te /
T02D1847:158b-17: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdul phra
T02D1847:158b-18: rab so so'i nang du gnas pa ji lta ba

T02D1847:158b-22: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de

T02D1847:158b-33: nag po dang dkar po dag gi g-yon pa dmar po'o //
T02D1847:158b-34: ser po la sogs pa'i dkar po ste /
T02D1847:158b-35: sku yang rtsa ba'i zhal gyi kha dog go //
T02D1847:158b-36: phyag g-yas kyi gnyis pa la rtsa ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1847:158b-37: thams cad kyi g-yas dang cig shos kyi mtshan ma

T02D1847:159a-7: sangs rgyas sku gsung rdo rje 'dzin //

T02D1847:159a-15: gsang ba stug po gsungs pa las //

T02D1847:159a-25: dpa'o // de'i dus nyid na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir de skad ces brjod pa ste /
