T02D1847:172a-33: pa rnams la'o // ngo bo med ces bya ba
T02D1847:172a-34: ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs par yod pa
T02D1847:172a-35: pa rnams la'o // med pa'o// sgom pa yang med
T02D1847:172a-36: ces bya ba ni chos rjes su 'jug pa'i sems
T02D1847:172a-37: kyang med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:172a-38: 'o na ji ltar snang pa mtha' yas bskyed pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:172a-39: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po med pa yang nam mkha' ste /
T02D1847:172b-0: ji ltar gnas te sgra dang @172b lhan cig tu
T02D1847:172b-1: 'brel par rtogs pa yin la de bzhin du de
T02D1847:172b-2: rnams kyang bskyed pa de kho na nyid ma yin
T02D1847:172b-3: par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1847:172b-4: yang na nam mkha' dang lhan cig tu rkang pa
T02D1847:172b-5: la sogs pa'i sbyor bas thogs pa med pa'i ngo
T02D1847:172b-6: bo de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas la sogs
T02D1847:172b-7: ba'i mtshan nyid du dngos por bsgrags pa ste /
T02D1847:172b-8: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni ma yin pa'i don to //
T02D1847:172b-9: sems las byung ba thams cad skye ba med pa'i
T02D1847:172b-10: rang bzhin gyis don yod grub pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1847:172b-11: sems gsungs pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1847:172b-12: pa la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ni /
T02D1847:172b-13: sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su med
T02D1847:172b-14: pa ste bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te sangs
T02D1847:172b-15: rgyas kyi ming yang sgrib pa yin zhes bya ba'i
T02D1847:172b-16: tshig las so // de nyid rdo rje ste don
T02D1847:172b-17: yod par grub pa'i ngo bos brtan pa ting nge
T02D1847:172b-18: 'dzin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces
T02D1847:172b-19: tshig las so // bya'o // rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba la /
T02D1847:172b-20: rang bzhin ni ngo bos dmigs su med pa'i ye
T02D1847:172b-21: shes kyi rang bzhin snang ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i
T02D1847:172b-23: don yod grub pa la sogs pa chos kyi ngo bo nyid de rgyu gsungs pa /
T02D1847:172b-25: rtag tu nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1847:172b-26: nye ba'i nyon mongs ba'i dri mas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:172b-27: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:172b-28: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ste nam mkha' bzhin du
T02D1847:172b-29: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir cung zad dang sbyor ba
T02D1847:172b-30: ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:172b-31: des na byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med pa
T02D1847:172b-32: ste gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gnas skabs
T02D1847:172b-33: la gnyis yang dag par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro
T02D1847:172b-34: // 'dis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1847:172b-36: dngos dang dngos med rnam sbyangs pas //
T02D1847:172b-39: da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs nas
T02D1847:172b-40: sems dad pas ched du brjod pa'i sngon du song
T02D1847:172b-42: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:172b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1847:172b-44: dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D1847:173a-0: rje 'dzin pa'o // de'i chos ni phung @173a * //
T02D1847:173a-1: po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1847:173a-2: da rnams kyis de kho na nyid kyi yi ge
T02D1847:173a-3: rnams ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs par byed pa'i
T02D1847:173a-4: tshig rnams so // ae ma ho sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:173a-5: ston pa po dang bstan par bya ba dang /
T02D1847:173a-6: bstan pa rnyed par dka' bar ston pa'o //
T02D1847:173a-7: sangs rgyas byung yang 'di lta bu'i chos nyid bdag
T02D1847:173a-8: cag rnams kyis nam yang thos pa med do zhes
T02D1847:173a-9: bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang rmad
T02D1847:173a-11: bcu bdun pa las kyang 'di'i chos bstan pa sngon
T02D1847:173a-12: byung ba rnams kyis kyang sngar bstan pa ma yin
T02D1847:173a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pa yin no
T02D1847:173a-14: // dag pa de nyid don dag ston //
T02D1847:173a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1847:173a-16: phyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas
T02D1847:173a-17: / bdag med chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1847:173a-18: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sku dang gsung dang
T02D1847:173a-19: thugs kyi dbye bas yang de la phyag byas pa'o
T02D1847:173a-21: / dag pa ni gnyis pa med pa ste de
T02D1847:173a-22: kho na nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T02D1847:173a-23: no // gang gi don de la de skad ces bya ste mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1847:173a-24: phyin ci ma log pas dag pa ste /
T02D1847:173a-25: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi mthus so //
T02D1847:173a-26: gang la don yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1847:173a-27: bdag med chos las yang dag byung ba ni rin chen tog ste /
T02D1847:173a-28: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:173a-29: dngos po mtha' dag yang dag pa ji lta ba
T02D1847:173a-30: bzhin so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
T02D1847:173a-31: phyir gdul bya thams cad kyi sangs rgyas byang chub
T02D1847:173a-32: rdzogs mdzad pa ste snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1847:173a-33: dgra dang bshes la sogs pa tha dad par mi
T02D1847:173a-34: rtog par 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par
T02D1847:173a-35: mdzad pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'i don yod
T02D1847:173a-36: grub pa'o // de tsam gyis ni byang chub kyi
T02D1847:173a-37: sems rdo rje ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs
T02D1847:173a-38: grub pa'o // so // dmigs pa med pa'i byams
T02D1847:173a-39: pa chen pos rang bzhin m'a ma k'i'i rnam pas
T02D1847:173a-40: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang bde bskyed pa'i
T02D1847:173a-42: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis 'jig rten ma
T02D1847:173a-43: lus pa rjes su gzung ba'i phyir spyan gyi rnam
T02D1847:173b-0: sems can thams cad kyi @173b chos dang lus dang
T02D1847:173b-1: don rgyas par byed pas dga' ba bskyed pas gos
T02D1847:173b-2: dkar mo'i rnam pa kun gyi don to //
T02D1847:173b-3: dbang du byed pas sgrol ma'i rnam par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1847:173b-4: byang chub la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pas
T02D1847:173b-5: / byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba'o //
T02D1847:173b-6: sa'i snying po la sogs pa dang /
T02D1847:173b-7: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas byang chub ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T02D1847:173b-8: 'di la spyod pa yod pas byang chub spyod pa yin no //
T02D1847:173b-9: dam pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gzugs rdo rje
T02D1847:173b-10: la sogs pa'i ngo bos nyon mongs pa thams cad
T02D1847:173b-11: kyi ri bo gcod par byed pa'i phyir rdo rje
T02D1847:173b-12: che'o // dad pa la sogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa
T02D1847:173b-13: las gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnam pas de bzhin
T02D1847:173b-14: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D1847:173b-15: kyi tshogs skyed par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1847:173b-16: che'o // thugs so // brtson 'grus mchog tu gyur
T02D1847:173b-17: pas nyon mongs pa mtha' dag gi dri ma bsal
T02D1847:173b-18: ba'i phyir dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhan gyis mi
T02D1847:173b-20: rnam par dag pa'i dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'chi
T02D1847:173b-21: ba'i 'jigs pa bsal nas sku la sogs pa dang
T02D1847:173b-22: tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i phyir padma mthar byed
T02D1847:173b-23: kyi ngo bo sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
T02D1847:173b-24: 'dzin no // padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin
T02D1847:173b-25: gyis rnam par g-yeng ba la sogs pa bgegs mtha'
T02D1847:173b-26: dag gi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:173b-27: mthar thug pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub la sems
T02D1847:173b-28: can rnams khrid par byed pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i
T02D1847:173b-29: ngo bos sangs rgyas dang byang chub rab tu ston
T02D1847:173b-30: pa'o // 'ang [?] zhes pa srung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1847:173b-31: la dbang ba'i khro bo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo dang
T02D1847:173b-32: dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa du ma'i rang
T02D1847:173b-33: bzhin gyis snang ba la yang /
T02D1847:173b-34: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1847:173b-35: zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1847:173b-36: de ltar lha mtha' dag gi bdag nyid du gyur
T02D1847:173b-37: pa byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo can rdo
T02D1847:173b-38: rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal ba'i gzhi byas
T02D1847:173b-39: pa yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
T02D1847:173b-40: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel rgyal bas byin
T02D1847:173b-41: pas mdzad pa las le'u gnyis pa byang chub kyi
T02D1847:173b-44: // / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1847:174a-0: ba'i lha dgong pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskyed @174a
T02D1847:174a-1: * // par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems
T02D1847:174a-2: bstan ba'i rjes la rdo rje la bkod pa'i le'u
T02D1847:174a-3: * // gsungs pa / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:174a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1847:174a-5: de rnams kyi spro ba ni sprul pa du ma mdzad pa'o //
T02D1847:174a-6: de nyid sprin te nam mkha' ma lus par khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:174a-7: bsdus nas dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i rnam pas rnam par brtags pa'i phyir bkod pa'o //
T02D1847:174a-8: 'di zhes bya ba ni rtsom ba'o //
T02D1847:174a-9: rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1847:174a-10: de nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D1847:174a-11: khyad par gyis brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te
T02D1847:174a-12: / de brjod par bya ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1847:174a-13: de gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1847:174a-14: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1847:174a-16: byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i sngags so //
T02D1847:174a-17: de la aom zhes bya ba ni khas len pa ste /
T02D1847:174a-18: de ltar 'di yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:174a-19: rnam par rtog pa thams cad yang dag pa ma
T02D1847:174a-20: yin pa'i phyir sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na ste de
T02D1847:174a-21: nyid dbyer med pas na badzra'o //
T02D1847:174a-22: de'i sv'a bh'a ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1847:174a-23: de'i a'atma rang bzhin gang la yod pa de aa
T02D1847:174a-24: ham ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1847:174a-25: rang bzhin nga [?] yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D1847:174a-26: go // yang na dngos po rnams thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1847:174a-27: rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1847:174a-28: sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyi phyir yang aom zhes
T02D1847:174a-29: bya ba ste yi ge'i brdas me long lta bu'i
T02D1847:174a-31: sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1847:174a-32: dzny'a na zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1847:174a-33: badzra zhes bya ba ni spro ba bstan pa'i phyir bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1847:174a-34: sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:174a-35: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyon mongs pa med pa'i
T02D1847:174a-36: ngo bo yin pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1847:174a-38: aa ham zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:174a-39: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bos bdag nyid nges par bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:174a-40: de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du bdag nyid nges par byas nas /
T02D1847:174a-41: rang gi lhag pa'i lha bsgom par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1847:174b-0: de yang @174b dgongs pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1847:174b-1: aom zhes bya ba dang por ldan //
T02D1847:174b-2: gnyis par sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya //
T02D1847:174b-3: gsum pa de bzhin dzny'a na'o //
T02D1847:174b-5: sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko lnga //
T02D1847:174b-6: drug ba aa ham zhes su brjod //
T02D1847:174b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
T02D1847:174b-8: skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin //
T02D1847:174b-10: rten sngon du song pa'i brten pa rnam par gzhag
T02D1847:174b-11: pa'i phyir rten gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan pa
T02D1847:174b-12: gsungs pa / nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:174b-13: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos kyi 'byung gnas dang rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ste /
T02D1847:174b-15: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni ji ltar 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du bsgom pa yin no //
T02D1847:174b-16: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni des skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:174b-19: nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par //
T02D1847:174b-20: chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las /
T02D1847:174b-21: byung ba sku gsum dam tshig ste /
T02D1847:174b-22: bsam gnas stan du de rab brtag / ces so //
T02D1847:174b-23: de'i phyir ye shes zhabs kyis kyang //
T02D1847:174b-24: bhr'um gyi 'khor lo las byung rig bcas pa'i //
T02D1847:174b-25: rnam par snang mdzad yan lag yang dag 'byung //
T02D1847:174b-27: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs so //
T02D1847:174b-28: 'od zer sprin ni sprul pa rnams so //
T02D1847:174b-29: bkod pa chen po ni re re las mtha' yas
T02D1847:174b-30: pa sprul pa gang la yod pa de'i 'od kyi
T02D1847:174b-32: des na 'di nyid kyi khyad par gzhan bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:174b-34: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam pas 'bar
T02D1847:174b-35: pa gang la yod pa de sangs rgyas 'bar ba
T02D1847:174b-36: ste / des na de nyid dang 'od mnyam pa med pa'o //
T02D1847:174b-37: 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab //
T02D1847:174b-38: ces bya ba ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang /
T02D1847:174b-39: chos mthun pas ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D1847:174b-40: de rnams kyis dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer
T02D1847:174b-41: gyi rtse mo la ston pa dang ldan pa'i phyir
T02D1847:174b-44: thub dbang 'od kyis dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i//
T02D1847:175a-0: @175a * // 'od kyis phyogs mtshams ma lus kun du khyab //
T02D1847:175a-2: kun nas yongs su zlum por te //
T02D1847:175a-3: zhes bya ba ni zlum por te /
T02D1847:175a-4: 'di yang snying po'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs so //
T02D1847:175a-5: phyi'i ni yang gru bzhi nyid do //
T02D1847:175a-6: gleng gzhi'i le'u las dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1847:175a-7: gru bzhi zhes bya bas 'di'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i
T02D1847:175a-8: phyir phyi'i khyams zlum po mi srid do //
T02D1847:175a-9: de lta bas na bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gcig pa gsal lo //
T02D1847:175a-10: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab //
T02D1847:175a-11: ces bya ba ni 'dod par bya ba ste /
T02D1847:175a-12: dam pa'i bde ba skyed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir
T02D1847:175a-13: dang lha'i gzugs kyi yon tan du byed pa goms
T02D1847:175a-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1847:175a-16: des khyab pa ni rang rang gi gnas su rnam par gnas pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:175a-17: mchod pa rnam ldas brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:175a-18: khyams la brten pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i gzugs rnams
T02D1847:175a-19: kyis brgyan pa'o // 'dis ni dkyil 'khor pa nyid
T02D1847:175a-20: thams cad bstan pa yin la lhag ma ni ye
T02D1847:175a-21: shes sgron ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1847:175a-22: gleng gzhir bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:175a-23: de ltar na rten dang brten pa dang bcas bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:175a-24: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D1847:175a-25: 'khor la re zhig gtso bo rnams bskyed pa'i kha
T02D1847:175a-26: dog dang mtshon cha des par bstan pa gsungs pa
T02D1847:175a-27: / bsgoms nas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:175a-28: de ltar bstan ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor la mdor bsdus nas bsgom par byas nas so //
T02D1847:175a-29: gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:175a-30: zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1847:175a-31: dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje 'chang
T02D1847:175a-32: chen po / yongs su gyur ba la sngon du
T02D1847:175a-33: song ba can bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to
T02D1847:175a-34: chen po / // gang gsungs pa bcu gsum pa las /
T02D1847:175a-35: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas //
T02D1847:175a-36: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
T02D1847:175a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D1847:175a-38: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gzugs tha dad pa nyid ston to //
T02D1847:175a-39: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang mtshan ma ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:175b-0: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan @175b pa'o //
T02D1847:175b-1: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1847:175b-2: 'dis kyang yan lag bzhi bsgom pa'i sa bon gsungs te /
T02D1847:175b-3: yan lag bzhi'i rim pa rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D1847:175b-4: 'di yang 'chad par 'gyur ba kun la sbyor ro //
T02D1847:175b-5: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chad chen po'o //
T02D1847:175b-6: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1847:175b-7: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02D1847:175b-9: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyu mthun
T02D1847:175b-10: pa thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug go zhes
T02D1847:175b-12: 'di yang snga ma dang byi ma dag tu 'brel ba'o //
T02D1847:175b-13: 'od byed ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1847:175b-14: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1847:175b-15: yin pa'i phyir mi shes pa'i mun pa sel ba'o
T02D1847:175b-16: // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:175b-17: sangs rgyas bdag po'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1847:175b-18: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor yang sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1847:175b-19: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin par brjod //
T02D1847:175b-20: ces bya ba'i tshig las so //
T02D1847:175b-21: 'dis ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa' bdag po'i dkyil 'khor yod do zhes bstan pa yin te /
T02D1847:175b-22: yang gsungs pa bcu drug pa las /
T02D1847:175b-23: rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa //
T02D1847:175b-24: dbus su gzugs ni legs bris pa //
T02D1847:175b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi gsung las byung //
T02D1847:175b-28: thams cad las mchog yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:175b-29: 'dir dang por rdo rje 'dzin par bstan pa thob
T02D1847:175b-30: pa ma yin nam gang rnam par snang mdzad dang
T02D1847:175b-31: mi bskyod pa dag gi bar du nye bar bstan
T02D1847:175b-32: zhe na / de'i kha dog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i don du'o //
T02D1847:175b-33: des na 'di'i rdo rje rtse dgu ba ma yin no //
T02D1847:175b-34: rnam par gtsigs pa'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir na rnam par gtsigs pa'i ste sku'o //
T02D1847:175b-35: gdug pa rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa'i sngags smra ba ni 'jigs pa'i tshig go //
T02D1847:175b-36: bdud rnams thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba'i phyir 'jigs pas te thugs kyis so //
T02D1847:175b-37: shel ni rdo'i byed brag go //
T02D1847:175b-38: zla ba ni ri bong can no //
T02D1847:175b-39: de dag gi 'od ni dang ba dang dkar ba
T02D1847:175b-40: ste zla ba'i 'od 'dra bar rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1847:176a-2: phyag na 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:176a-3: ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1847:176a-4: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:176a-5: rnam par dag pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa ste rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1847:176a-6: rtse mo dgu pa rdo rje che //
T02D1847:176a-7: zhes bya ba ni rin po che cha dgu ba la rdo rje che zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1847:176a-8: de'i zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ba'o //
T02D1847:176a-10: zhes pa ni kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02D1847:176a-11: rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1847:176a-12: zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i 'bar bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1847:176a-13: phyag na rin chen rab bsgoms pa //
T02D1847:176a-15: de ltar rin chen dbang phyug yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1847:176a-16: kun du 'bar ba'i sprin zhes bya ba ni 'od zer phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'o //
T02D1847:176a-17: 'di'i don ni rin chen dbang phyug 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba bsgom ste /
T02D1847:176a-18: de yi phyag tu bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:176a-21: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer shin tu dmar po dang pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:176a-22: 'dod chags 'bar ba mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:176a-23: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen pos chags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:176a-25: zhes bya ba ni kha dog ljang gu don yod grub par blta'o //
T02D1847:176a-26: gang yang gsungs pa gleng gzhi'i le'u las ljang gu nag po dkar po'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1847:176a-27: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang sgeg pa'i gzugs can te /
T02D1847:176a-28: 'di yang mi bskyod pa ma gtogs pa thams cad kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1847:176a-29: lha rdzogs pa rnams la rnam par byang bar mngon
T02D1847:176a-30: par zhe na pa bsal pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings
T02D1847:176a-31: ni byin gyis brlabs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:176a-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:176a-33: dharm'a rnams kyi dh'a tu ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1847:176a-34: sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ste gang la yod pa de ni aa ham ste de bzhin du'o //
T02D1847:176a-35: dang po sbyor ba rdzogs nas //
T02D1847:176a-36: sems brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor sprul pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1847:176a-38: de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:176b-0: dkyil 'khor @176b mchog ni bri bar bya //
T02D1847:176b-2: sems brtan par bya ba'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:176b-3: lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:176b-4: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog dkar po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:176b-5: sna'i rtse mo zhes bya ba ni man ngag las padma'i sna ste /
T02D1847:176b-6: mtshan ma'i nang du rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1847:176b-10: nan tan gyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis so //
T02D1847:176b-11: rnal 'byor ba'i sa zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas so //
T02D1847:176b-12: rtag par zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma byung gi bar du'o //
T02D1847:176b-13: gang yang gsungs pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:176b-14: rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa //
T02D1847:176b-15: mtshan ma nam zhig byung ba na //
T02D1847:176b-16: ji srid nam mkha'i spyod yul du //
T02D1847:176b-17: mtshan ma rnams kyang spro bar bya ;
T02D1847:176b-19: mtshan ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid bco brgyad pa las /
T02D1847:176b-20: smig rgyu lta bu dang po ste //
T02D1847:176b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02D1847:176b-22: de nyid 'dir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnal 'byor pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1847:176b-23: gang gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D1847:176b-24: de kho na nyid las rdo rje phra mo'i ting
T02D1847:176b-25: nge 'dzin gyis gang la mtshan ma byung ba ste
T02D1847:176b-27: de la mthong dang thos pa shes //
T02D1847:176b-28: de la mkha' gnas blo ldan gyis //
T02D1847:176b-30: 'od zer phreng ba ngo mtshar gyur //
T02D1847:176b-31: rigs 'di'i kha dog dbye ba yis //
T02D1847:176b-32: des na blo ldan bdag nyid kyang //
T02D1847:176b-33: yid la brtags par dkar dang dag / gang zhig nag po mi dge bstan //
T02D1847:176b-34: dmar po chags pa rab tu gsungs //
T02D1847:176b-35: ser po rgyas par de bzhin no //
T02D1847:176b-36: rmongs pa zhes bya cho ga min //
T02D1847:176b-37: sprin gyis bsgribs pas mkhas pa yis //
T02D1847:176b-39: brtan pa zhes pa ni bsgoms pas brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D1847:176b-40: spro zhes bya ba ni spro bar bya'o //
T02D1847:176b-41: mchog rab ni thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:176b-42: 'di ji lta bu yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:177a-1: khyab pas sprin te sprin bzhin no //
T02D1847:177a-2: khyad par ci zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:177a-3: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:177a-5: mtshan ma yang dag spro bar bya //
T02D1847:177a-7: sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig ma yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1847:177a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:177a-9: spyan la sogs pa'i sprul pa yang spro bar bya
T02D1847:177a-12: gang sems brtan pas dkyil 'khor sprul par 'dod pa yin no /
T02D1847:177a-13: de'i tshe rang gi rig ma'i padma'i rlung du ji
T02D1847:177a-14: lta ba bzhin lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par byas nas
T02D1847:177a-15: de nas cho ga bzhin du gdon par bya'o //
T02D1847:177a-16: phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas mtshan ma thob pas
T02D1847:177a-17: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya bar
T02D1847:177a-18: ston to zhes kha cig zer ro //
T02D1847:177a-19: spros pa bsdus pa'i rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:177a-20: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:177a-21: chos 'byung gi nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang
T02D1847:177a-22: de'i dbus su gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1847:177a-23: yin no // de bzhin rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1847:177a-24: zhes bya ba ni bsdus nas mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:177a-25: bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i tshig gi sgra'i rdul
T02D1847:177a-26: tshon gyi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams bkod pa yang
T02D1847:177a-27: ji lta ba bzhin du bya zhes bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:177a-28: gsad ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D1847:177a-29: thams cad kyi yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i
T02D1847:177a-31: de'i dbus su gnas pa ji lta ba bsgom par
T02D1847:177a-32: bya ste de ni gong 'og gnyis kar sbyar ro
T02D1847:177a-33: // 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad bdag po yin pas so //
T02D1847:177a-34: padma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni bdag po dang mtshungs pa'i nyams yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:177a-35: de nyid kyi phyir 'chad par 'gyur te /
T02D1847:177a-36: chags pa thams cad 'dod chags bdag / ces bya'o //
T02D1847:177a-38: dkyil 'khor thams cad la rang gi bdag po dang
T02D1847:177a-39: bcas pa'i nyams dang ldan pa de ltar dkyil 'khor
T02D1847:177a-40: pa thams cad bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1847:177a-41: to // bzlas pa bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:177a-42: lha sgom pa dang 'byin pa'i sngags brjod pa ste
T02D1847:177b-0: to // / de @177b yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //
T02D1847:177b-1: rin chen brtson pas zhes bya ba ni rin chen
T02D1847:177b-2: 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1847:177b-3: don to // 'dis ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la
T02D1847:177b-4: bdag po'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas lha rnams
T02D1847:177b-5: dbyung bar bya zhes ston par byed do //
T02D1847:177b-6: nam mkha' nye bar zhes bya ba ni thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1847:177b-7: sbyor ba'i sgra smos pas 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D1847:177b-8: ji lta ba bzhin du thabs dang shes rab snyoms
T02D1847:177b-9: par 'jug pa'i padma'i nad du dkyil 'khor rdzogs par
T02D1847:177b-10: byas nas dbyung bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1847:177b-12: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan zla ba yin la /
T02D1847:177b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan rnams kyi nyi ma yin no zhes zer te /
T02D1847:177b-14: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1847:177b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par /
T02D1847:177b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:177b-18: zhes bya bas mi bskyod pa'i gdan nyi ma yin par gsungs so //
T02D1847:177b-19: de'i rjes su 'brangs shing man ngag dang lhan cig
T02D1847:177b-20: pas rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i yang gdan
T02D1847:177b-21: de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1847:177b-22: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1847:177b-23: zhes bya ba 'dis rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan zla ba yin par lan du mar gsungs so //
T02D1847:177b-24: 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog / ces bya
T02D1847:177b-25: ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1847:177b-26: dang bcas pa'o // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1847:177b-27: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sku la
T02D1847:177b-28: sogs pa sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin pa'i
T02D1847:177b-29: phyir ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1847:177b-30: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:177b-31: rdo rje las byung ba yis zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:177b-32: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las nges par skyes
T02D1847:177b-33: pa'o // thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa //
T02D1847:177b-35: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul yod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa gsum pa thob par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1847:177b-36: yang na mchog tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1847:177b-37: ngo bo nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob
T02D1847:177b-38: pa ste / thams cad la mchog tu gyur pa'i
T02D1847:177b-39: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob pa zhes bya
T02D1847:177b-40: pa ste / ba'i don to // de yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:177b-41: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa ste //
T02D1847:178a-2: de nyid bcu bsdus pa las kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:178a-3: shin tu rdzogs pa thob pa yis //
T02D1847:178a-4: rdzogs pa bdud rtsi yi ni gnas //
T02D1847:178a-5: ye shes snying por gyur pa'i phyir //
T02D1847:178a-6: dkyil 'khor yongs su brjod par bya //
T02D1847:178a-8: des na 'di sgom par byed pa yang de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par bstan to //
T02D1847:178a-9: rdo rje bkod pa las dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste /
T02D1847:178a-10: de la ni brjod par bya ba nyid du len par byed pa ste /
T02D1847:178a-11: yongs su gcod par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:178a-12: lhag ma ni bshad pa nyid do //
T02D1847:178a-13: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel rgyal bas byin pas mdzad pa las le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1847:178a-15: // / da ni ji lta ba bzhin slob dpon gyi
T02D1847:178a-16: go 'phang thob nas chud thams cad kyi don yang
T02D1847:178a-18: phra mo'i rnal 'byor goms pas sgom pa la sems brtan par gyur pas kyang /
T02D1847:178a-19: dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ram slob ma bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02D1847:178a-20: dkyil 'khor byed pa snang ba nyid do //
T02D1847:178a-22: dkyil 'khor dag dang mi ldan na //
T02D1847:178a-23: sngags kyi dngos grub dam pa med //
T02D1847:178a-24: ji ltar rlung dang bral ba yis //
T02D1847:178a-26: dkyil 'khor dman par gyur pa dang //
T02D1847:178a-27: dam tshig kyang ni spangs pa dang //
T02D1847:178a-28: gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes na //
T02D1847:178a-29: bsgrubs kyang ci yang ma 'grub bo //
T02D1847:178a-31: snang ba rdo rje 'char ba las kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:178a-32: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing //
T02D1847:178a-33: dbang bskur ba yang ma thob la //
T02D1847:178a-34: byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs dang //
T02D1847:178a-35: mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
T02D1847:178a-36: sbyin mi bya bar gang gsungs pa //
T02D1847:178a-37: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1847:178a-39: de nas bdag dang gzhan la bstan par nus pa'i
T02D1847:178a-40: dkyil 'khor yid kyis sprul par mi nus par rdul
T02D1847:178a-41: tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar nye bar bstan pa
T02D1847:178a-42: gsungs nas / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:178a-43: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'chad
T02D1847:178a-44: par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod nas
T02D1847:178a-46: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:178b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @178b byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:178b-1: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig gsum gyis chos dang /
T02D1847:178b-3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin go rims bzhin du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1847:178b-4: sku'i dkyil 'khor dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02D1847:178b-6: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / ces phye la /
T02D1847:178b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig phye nas /
T02D1847:178b-8: tshig rnam pa lngas ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1847:178b-9: dkyil 'khor du gsungs so zhes gzhan dag 'dod do
T02D1847:178b-10: // bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa ste /
T02D1847:178b-12: sku'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dbye bas khyad par du gsungs pa /
T02D1847:178b-13: mtshan rnams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02D1847:178b-14: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1847:178b-15: zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:178b-16: mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1847:178b-17: zhes bya ba ni phra ba dang /
T02D1847:178b-20: chad pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i ri mo'o //
T02D1847:178b-21: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D1847:178b-22: sku'i mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02D1847:178b-23: rnam par snang mdzad bdag po yin pas so //
T02D1847:178b-24: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung ba zhes bya ba la /
T02D1847:178b-25: zhi ba'i chos thams cad brtags pa'i dmigs pa med
T02D1847:178b-26: pa gang la yod pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye
T02D1847:178b-27: shes de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:178b-28: de'i phyir mchog nyid ni gtso bos so //
T02D1847:178b-29: yang dag par 'byung ba ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:178b-30: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1847:178b-31: zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa yin la /
T02D1847:178b-32: sngags kyi tshul du bstan pa'i rnam par dag pa skyed par byed pa ste /
T02D1847:178b-33: der zhugs pa tsam gyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1847:178b-34: sgrib pa'i dri ma spangs pa thob pa'i phyir ro
T02D1847:178b-35: // gsung gi mchog ces bya ba ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:178b-36: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02D1847:178b-38: sems can thams cad kyi sems chen po ni spros pa thams cad dang bal ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1847:179a-2: dag cing zhes bya ba ni bag chags dang bcas
T02D1847:179a-3: pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams kyis kun nas
T02D1847:179a-4: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:179a-5: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:179a-6: rang bzhin dri ma med ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i thugs te /
T02D1847:179a-7: dri ma rnams ni sgro brtags pa las byung pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:179a-8: de ltar na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D1847:179a-9: shes kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin
T02D1847:179a-10: no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1847:179a-11: yang na sems can gyi sgras 'dir rdzas kyi tshig ste /
T02D1847:179a-12: phyi'i dngos po thams cad la tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:179a-13: sems can thams cad nyid sems chen po ste /
T02D1847:179a-14: chen po nyid ni dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:179a-15: 'dis ni gzung ba med par bstan to //
T02D1847:179a-16: de bas na 'dzin pa yang med pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1847:179a-17: dag pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa 'ba' zhig ste /
T02D1847:179a-18: yang dag par rig pa tsam mo //
T02D1847:179a-19: 'di ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa rang bzhin dri
T02D1847:179a-20: ma med pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba la
T02D1847:179a-21: sogs pa de kho na nyid la rtag tu med
T02D1847:179a-22: pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:179a-23: 'dis ni 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
T02D1847:179a-24: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di la dkyil 'khor bri ba la /
T02D1847:179a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab
T02D1847:179a-26: pa ltar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor des par bri
T02D1847:179a-27: ba la'ang slob ma brtag pa'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D1847:179a-28: pa'i gzugs rdo rje slob dpon dpal ldan pa dag
T02D1847:179a-29: po'i rnal 'byor pa la rtag pa nyid du gsol
T02D1847:179a-30: ba gdab par bya zhes so //
T02D1847:179a-31: bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i dus su yang
T02D1847:179a-32: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su chags pa'i
T02D1847:179a-33: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de
T02D1847:179a-34: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba
T02D1847:179a-35: 'debs pa zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1847:179a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni ;
T02D1847:179a-37: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1847:179a-38: ston pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:179a-39: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bstan pa ston pas so //
T02D1847:179a-40: sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i rang gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1847:179b-0: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rang bzhin @179b yin pa'i phyir khams gsum pa ste /
T02D1847:179b-1: 'jig rten pa dang rang gi lung las grags pas de dag gi khyad par gnyis so //
T02D1847:179b-2: 'jig rten gsum cho ga ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
T02D1847:179b-3: de rnams kyi rdo rje mchog ste /
T02D1847:179b-4: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1847:179b-5: 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog go //
T02D1847:179b-7: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gsum la ste /
T02D1847:179b-8: khro bo la sogs pa'i sprul pas ston cing phan pa las sbyar bas na /
T02D1847:179b-9: 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa pos so //
T02D1847:179b-10: nyams dga' bas zhes bya ba ni mthong ba tsam
T02D1847:179b-11: gyis kyang phan pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1847:179b-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs //
T02D1847:179b-13: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1847:179b-14: kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi thugs
T02D1847:179b-15: so // yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rten nyid kyi snying po len pas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1847:179b-16: dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:179b-17: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:179b-19: byang chub sems kyang dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D1847:179b-21: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1847:179b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:179b-23: thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
T02D1847:179b-24: zhes bya ba ni rdul mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor gsum po 'di yang /
T02D1847:179b-25: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs te /
T02D1847:179b-28: dbyibs la sogs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:179b-31: rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyi //
T02D1847:179b-32: 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las //
T02D1847:179b-33: bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba //
T02D1847:179b-34: phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D1847:179b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1847:179b-37: sar pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:179b-38: sar pa ni gzhan du yongs su longs ma spyad pa'o //
T02D1847:179b-39: legs par bkal pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:179b-40: ye shes kyi thig skud du bya ba'i phyir legs par bsgril pa'o //
T02D1847:179b-41: dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyis ring ba dang sgo'i nyi shu cha'i sbom ni tshad ma'o //
T02D1847:180a-1: pa ni mdud pa med pa dang /
T02D1847:180a-3: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1847:180a-4: cho ga shes pa dang ri mo'i las la mkhas
T02D1847:180a-5: pa'o // lus dang sems ni bsgoms pa yis //
T02D1847:180a-6: zhes bya ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1847:180a-7: sku rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pa sngon du
T02D1847:180a-8: song pas bri bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1847:180a-9: gang gsungs pa bco brgyad pa las /
T02D1847:180a-10: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1847:180a-11: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1847:180a-12: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab pa //
T02D1847:180a-13: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02D1847:180a-15: khru bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:180a-16: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis
T02D1847:180a-17: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir phyogs
T02D1847:180a-18: so so zhing khru bcu gnyis so //
T02D1847:180a-19: de yang gsungs pa dgongs pa las //
T02D1847:180a-20: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02D1847:180a-21: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis so //
T02D1847:180a-23: ngos re re la khru gsum gsum yin no //
T02D1847:180a-25: gru bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gsungs so //
T02D1847:180a-26: sgo bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:180a-27: 'khor lo'i brgyad cha gcig gi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:180a-28: de'i dbus su 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni de'i
T02D1847:180a-29: phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan de'i dbus su bri bar
T02D1847:180a-30: bya ste / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod //
T02D1847:180a-31: ces bya ba'i tshig las so //
T02D1847:180a-32: rab tu zlum zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:180a-34: yongs su zhes bya ba ni thams cad de rnam
T02D1847:180a-35: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas kyis 'di yongs
T02D1847:180a-36: su bskor ba yin zhe na kha cig 'chad de
T02D1847:180a-37: / de'i gzhung gi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ma
T02D1847:180a-38: gsungs pas 'di yang gru bzhi pa la sogs pa
T02D1847:180a-39: rigs shing de nang gi yongs su bskor pa'i phyir
T02D1847:180a-41: de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya //
T02D1847:180a-42: zhes pa ni de nas nus pa ji lta ba
T02D1847:180a-43: bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la gnas
T02D1847:180a-44: ji lta ba bzhin du nyi ma dang zla ba'i
T02D1847:180a-45: gdan bris la ci rigs par mi bskyod pa la
T02D1847:180a-46: sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D1847:180a-47: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
T02D1847:180b-0: gang zhig 'dir ma gsungs pa'i cho ga @180b spyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1847:180b-2: gang dag tu ni rang nyid kyis //
T02D1847:180b-3: las kyi cho ga rnams med pa //
T02D1847:180b-4: de ni ci yi rgyud dag la //
T02D1847:180b-5: gsungs pa'i cho ga mkhas pas brten //
T02D1847:180b-7: cho ga yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par blta bar bya ste 'dir mi ston no //
T02D1847:180b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:180b-9: phyag rgya dgod par bya ba'i phyir gnas kyi nges par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:180b-10: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rang gi gnas su
T02D1847:180b-11: gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'i mtshan ma rdo rje 'bar
T02D1847:180b-12: ba nag po rtse lnga pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1847:180b-13: 'dis rnam par snad mdzad la sogs pa'i 'ang rang
T02D1847:180b-14: rang gi gdan la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bri ba
T02D1847:180b-15: gsungs pa / shar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:180b-16: 'di'i don ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang /
T02D1847:180b-17: rin po che cha dgu pa ljang gu dang //
T02D1847:180b-18: padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
T02D1847:180b-19: ral gri nam mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs te /
T02D1847:180b-20: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1847:180b-21: gnas kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri
T02D1847:180b-23: spyan la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dgod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:180b-24: spyan zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam pa'o //
T02D1847:180b-25: dbus na sprin dang mnyam pa'i 'od //
T02D1847:180b-27: sprin bzhin nag po dbus na mnyam pa ste /
T02D1847:180b-28: zlum po'i 'od yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1847:180b-29: mig 'bras nag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:180b-30: kha cig ni spyan zhes bya ba spyan gyi mtshan
T02D1847:180b-31: ma'i skabs yin pas de'i mtshan ma bri bar bya
T02D1847:180b-32: zhes zer te / dbus na sprin gyi chu'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dkar po'o //
T02D1847:180b-33: de dang mtshungs pa'i 'od mdzes pa yod pas dbus
T02D1847:180b-34: na sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od de dkar po zhes
T02D1847:180b-36: de yang brgyud pa las 'ongs pa ma yin no //
T02D1847:180b-37: shar gyi grva zhes bya ba ni me'i mtshams so //
T02D1847:180b-38: m'a ma k'i yi rigs 'byung ba //
T02D1847:180b-39: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02D1847:180b-40: lho phyogs zhes bya ba ni bden bral lo //
T02D1847:180b-41: sdong bu dang bcas pa'i autpala ste padma dmar po'o //
T02D1847:180b-42: nub phyogs zhes bya ba ni rlung du'o //
T02D1847:180b-44: kha cig ni ser sngo zhes zer ro //
T02D1847:181a-0: byang phyogs zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi @181a * //
T02D1847:181a-3: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i 'od
T02D1847:181a-4: rdo rje tho ba shar phyogs kyi sgo la gnas
T02D1847:181a-5: par bya'o // rdo rje 'bar ba 'od bzang ba //
T02D1847:181a-6: be con zhes bya ba ni mi phyed par 'bar
T02D1847:181a-7: bar snang ba'i be con lho phyogs su bri bar
T02D1847:181a-8: bya'o // mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod par byed pa dang /
T02D1847:181a-9: chos mthun pas ral gri bzhin 'bar ba de rnams
T02D1847:181a-10: kyi ye shes kyi snang ba byed pas ral gri
T02D1847:181a-12: 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i padma dmar po nub phyogs su bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:181a-13: rdo rje 'khyil ba rdor can gyi //
T02D1847:181a-15: rdo rje 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par
T02D1847:181a-16: dbye ba med par bstan pa grub pa'i gcig gis
T02D1847:181a-19: rdo rje 'khyil ba ni bgegs mthar byed kyi rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02D1847:181a-20: ji ltar yin zhe na gsungs pa rdo rje can gyi zhes bya ba /
T02D1847:181a-21: ji ltar mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje kha gyes pa sngon po 'od bzang po ste /
T02D1847:181a-22: de bzhin du 'di yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:181a-23: yang na rdo rje 'khyil pa zhes bya ba spyi'i tshig gis nyi ma yang bzung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1847:181a-24: de yang dbang bskur ba'i ming 'di yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:181a-25: gang yang de kho na nyid bsdus pa las bar
T02D1847:181a-26: snang la rgyu ba'i lha thams cad kyi bdag po
T02D1847:181a-28: 'di lta ste bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ni rdo rje 'khyil pa zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1847:181a-29: de'i phyir 'dis bye brag tu byed de rdo rje can zhes pas so //
T02D1847:181a-30: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid mi
T02D1847:181a-31: bskyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1847:181a-33: rdo rje'i steng du rdo rje bri //
T02D1847:181a-35: gzhan ni sna tshogs rdo rje zhes zer ro //
T02D1847:181a-38: 'byin pa'i sngags la sogs pa nges par bstan pa
T02D1847:181a-39: las gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i yang 'dir go
T02D1847:181a-40: rims bzhin du me long dang /
T02D1847:181a-45: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D1847:181a-51: lho phyogs su go rims bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1847:181b-0: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ni 'dir @181b dkyil 'khor pa ma yin pa'i phyir med pa'o //
T02D1847:181b-1: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad ma gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1847:181b-2: rnams dang khro bo rnams kyi gdan nyi ma yin
T02D1847:181b-3: la gzhan rnams ni zla ba'i gdan yin no zhes
T02D1847:181b-5: yongs su gsal bar shes zhes bya ba ni kun nas gsal ba ste /
T02D1847:181b-6: bri ba la sogs pa'i las mthar phyin par shes par byas nas /
T02D1847:181b-7: mchod par bya ba zhes bya ba ni cho ga
T02D1847:181b-8: bzhin du bdag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'dir
T02D1847:181b-9: nges par ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba dang
T02D1847:181b-10: cig shos kyis mchod pa bya ba'o //
T02D1847:181b-11: lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis //
T02D1847:181b-12: zhes bya ni rang rang gi dkyil 'khor du sku
T02D1847:181b-13: rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas
T02D1847:181b-15: de la sku'i dkyil 'khor du re zhig gsang ba'i mchod pa nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:181b-16: bcu drug ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:181b-17: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin //
T02D1847:181b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lo brgyad gnyis pa'o //
T02D1847:181b-21: nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1847:181b-22: stong pa nyid phyir bcu drug la'o //
T02D1847:181b-23: skye ba med par gnas gang yin //
T02D1847:181b-24: btsun mo zhes ni brjod par bya //
T02D1847:181b-26: / rab tu mdangs bzad zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:181b-27: yang na mdangs bzang zhes bya ba ni ming gis phyogs gcig bstan pas zla ba'i mdangs bzung ste /
T02D1847:181b-29: byin pa zhes bya ba bzhin te /
T02D1847:181b-30: de'i 'od can gyi rnam pa yin pa'i phyir dkar mo'o //
T02D1847:181b-31: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gos dkar mo'i tshul du mos par bya'o //
T02D1847:181b-32: de'i lo'i nges pa ni brgyad pa las /
T02D1847:181b-33: na chung gzhon nu mig yangs ma //
T02D1847:181b-34: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ste //
T02D1847:181b-35: lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed //
T02D1847:181b-36: byol song las ni rab tu brtag / ces bya ba'i tshig las so //
T02D1847:181b-37: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang bdun pa las /
T02D1847:181b-38: bud med brten pa'i sems ldan pa //
T02D1847:181b-39: lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la //
T02D1847:181b-41: dri dang me tog phreng gis 'khrugs //
T02D1847:182a-0: zhes bya ba ni dri zhim pas byugs @182a * //
T02D1847:182a-2: me tog mang po dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:182a-3: dri ni rnam par snang mdzad de //
T02D1847:182a-4: 'di'i mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta bar bya'o //
T02D1847:182a-5: me tog ni btsun mo dgu dang nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1847:182a-6: dri la sogs pa nyid dang /
T02D1847:182a-8: de rnams kyis 'khrugs pa ni rdul phra rab so
T02D1847:182a-9: so la zhugs pas mchod rten du gyur pa ste
T02D1847:182a-10: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D1847:182a-12: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa kun du byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:182a-13: dri dang me tog ces bya ba ni bdud rtsi
T02D1847:182a-14: lnga'i nye bar mtshon pa'i don 'di dag yin no
T02D1847:182a-15: // 'dis mnyam par 'khrugs zhes bya ba ni dam
T02D1847:182a-16: tshig dang ldan pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1847:182a-18: nas nges par bstan par khong du chud par bya'o
T02D1847:182a-19: // du'o // // de'i dbus zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su blos gnas pa'o //
T02D1847:182a-20: byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i tshogs
T02D1847:182a-21: dang ldan pa ji srid kyi bar du byas pa'o
T02D1847:182a-22: // m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:182a-24: yon tan ska rags zhes bya ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:182a-25: spro ba la sogs pa ni 'dir dkyil 'khor du bsgrub par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:182a-26: de yang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya ste bdag gis 'dir ma bris pa'o //
T02D1847:182a-27: bshang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyi'i mchod pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1847:182a-28: 'dir don ni bshad ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig padma'i snod du bzhag la /
T02D1847:182a-29: cho gas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byas nas /
T02D1847:182a-30: dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1847:182a-31: des kyang tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por gyur pa nyid kyis nges par bya ste /
T02D1847:182a-32: tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni byang chub pa la 'ching pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:182a-35: 'jig rten na ni gang zag bzhi //
T02D1847:182a-36: bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni //
T02D1847:182a-37: cung zad mngon par brtson byas kyang //
T02D1847:182a-39: gang zhig sems ni ma skyes kyang //
T02D1847:182a-40: the tshom yod pa nyid kyang yang //
T02D1847:182a-41: snang ba thob pa mi byed de //
T02D1847:182a-42: ma dad pas ni mi 'grub bo //
T02D1847:182b-0: @182b gzhan yang dngos po thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D1847:182b-1: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho ga'i ngo bos blta bar bya'o //
T02D1847:182b-2: 'on kyang yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1847:182b-3: de yang snang ba rdo rje 'char ba las gsungs pa ;
T02D1847:182b-4: las dang po yi sems can la //
T02D1847:182b-5: rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya //
T02D1847:182b-6: phyi nas don ni go ba na //
T02D1847:182b-7: dogs pa med par bstan par bya //
T02D1847:182b-9: nus pa ma thob pas kyang 'de goms par byed pa na gsang ste bstan par bya'o //
T02D1847:182b-10: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:182b-12: / mdor na thams cad bya ba ste /
T02D1847:182b-13: gal te 'phrigs par gyur pa na //
T02D1847:182b-14: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi 'grub po //
T02D1847:182b-15: sems can kun gyi dang ba yi //
T02D1847:182b-16: sems ni zhi zhing 'od gsal ba //
T02D1847:182b-17: sna tshogs dngos pos gos pa med //
T02D1847:182b-18: sems zhes bya ba de nyid dngos //
T02D1847:182b-19: de ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga shes //
T02D1847:182b-20: nye bar longs spyod de kho na //
T02D1847:182b-21: gzhan du dge la spro ba yis //
T02D1847:182b-23: de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi //
T02D1847:182b-24: yan lag mchog las blang bar bya //
T02D1847:182b-25: gzhan du dge las byung ba yi //
T02D1847:182b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes mi 'gyur //
T02D1847:182b-27: nye bar longs spyod mnyam spyod pas //
T02D1847:182b-28: thams cad nye bar longs spyod bya //
T02D1847:182b-29: gal te gzhan du rmongs pa'i bdag / mnar med nges par 'tshed par 'gyur //
T02D1847:182b-31: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel rgyal bas byin pas mdzad pa las le'u bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1847:182b-33: // / de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing
T02D1847:182b-34: rjes su snang ba thob pas mi rtog pa'i spyod
T02D1847:182b-35: pa dang ldan pa ni 'dir snod yin par nye
T02D1847:182b-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:182b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs
T02D1847:182b-40: dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste
T02D1847:182b-41: / de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1847:182b-42: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:182b-43: gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la skal ba
T02D1847:182b-44: ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed pas rnam
T02D1847:182b-46: dngos po thams cad kyi chos nyid kyis mnyam pa
T02D1847:182b-47: nyid kyi mchog sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin yin
T02D1847:183a-0: @183a * // pa'i phyir sku mchog ste rin chen 'byung ba'o //
T02D1847:183a-1: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las byung ba'i snying
T02D1847:183a-2: rje chen pos mngon par brlan pas khams gsum gyi
T02D1847:183a-3: sems can khas blangs pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas
T02D1847:183a-4: te gnas kyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1847:183a-5: spyod pa kun ni sems can ma lus pa //
T02D1847:183a-6: 'dul pa'i ched du cho gas 'jug pa'o //
T02D1847:183a-7: de'i mchog ni gtso bo ste bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1847:183a-8: gang gi de yin pa'i spyod pa kun mchog ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1847:183a-9: chos don zhes bya ba la /
T02D1847:183a-10: chos ni sems can la sogs pa rnams te ;
T02D1847:183a-11: de rnams kyi don gyi rang bzhin yin gyi chos
T02D1847:183a-12: kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid mi bskyod
T02D1847:183a-13: pa'o // gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las ma
T02D1847:183a-14: gtogs pa'i chos med do zhes bya ba'i tshig las
T02D1847:183a-15: pa'o // so // de ltar rigs lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1847:183a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs lnga la brten pa gsungs
T02D1847:183a-17: pa ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1847:183a-18: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo las spyod pa mchog ste /
T02D1847:183a-20: de'i don ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02D1847:183a-21: de'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes kha cig zer ro //
T02D1847:183a-22: rnam par mi rtog don las byung //
T02D1847:183a-23: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02D1847:183a-24: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i rigs so //
T02D1847:183a-25: dngos grub mchog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1847:183a-26: sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams las skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1847:183a-27: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:183a-28: theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med //
T02D1847:183a-30: shin tu mngon par brtson par skye ba 'di la
T02D1847:183a-31: sangs rgyas nyid thob par byed pa'i phyir 'dir bla
T02D1847:183a-32: na med pa ste rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam
T02D1847:183a-33: mo // 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
T02D1847:183a-34: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa nyid
T02D1847:183a-35: kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub yin
T02D1847:183a-36: la des na 'di'i don du gnyer ba rnams kyis
T02D1847:183a-37: rtag tu gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la rnam
T02D1847:183a-38: par gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1847:183a-40: rnam par mi rtog don las byung //
T02D1847:183b-0: @183b zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1847:183b-1: shes la rnam par gnas pas 'dod chags drag po
T02D1847:183b-2: la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa yang dag par dkrugs
T02D1847:183b-3: pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid 'grub par
T02D1847:183b-6: theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med //
T02D1847:183b-8: shes rab thugs byung dngos grub la //
T02D1847:183b-9: rigs la sogs pa'i nges pa ci //
T02D1847:183b-10: zhes pa'i bsam pa gsungs pa //
T02D1847:183b-11: gtum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:183b-12: gtum po rab tu grags pa nyid de mtha' skyes so //
T02D1847:183b-13: smyig ma mkhan zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:183b-14: gtum pa'i bye brag nyid de mda'i las byed par zhes bya bar rab tu grags so //
T02D1847:183b-15: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zhags pa la sogs pa yang gzung ngo //
T02D1847:183b-16: de rnams ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:183b-17: gsod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:183b-18: gsod don ni rgya la sogs pa rnams kyis yin la /
T02D1847:183b-19: don du ni 'tsho bar byed pa'i don yin la /
T02D1847:183b-20: sems dpa' ste gsod don gnyer sems dpa'o //
T02D1847:183b-21: mtshams med la sogs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:183b-22: pha dang ma dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /
T02D1847:183b-23: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /
T02D1847:183b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung
T02D1847:183b-25: ba ste shi ma thag tu dmyal bar 'gro ba'i
T02D1847:183b-26: rgyu'i phyir mtshams med pa lnga'o //
T02D1847:183b-27: sogs pa'i sgras ni mtshams med pa dang nye ba la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba ste /
T02D1847:183b-28: de la mtshams med pa dad nye ba ni /
T02D1847:183b-29: ma dgra bcom ma sun byas nas //
T02D1847:183b-30: byang chub sems dpa' nges gnas dang //
T02D1847:183b-31: slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi //
T02D1847:183b-32: 'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrog pa dag / mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste //
T02D1847:183b-33: lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin //
T02D1847:183b-35: 'di las gzhan mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i
T02D1847:183b-36: las byed pa de las bzlog nas ting 'dzin gyi
T02D1847:183b-37: nus pas nges par nyams su myong ba'i las kyang
T02D1847:183b-38: spangs te / 'grub pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub ster bar 'gyur //
T02D1847:183b-39: las rnams cung zad kyang chud za ba med pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02D1847:183b-40: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang bral
T02D1847:183b-41: ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pas 'gal ba med
T02D1847:183b-42: do // yang ni sgras chos dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1847:184a-0: @184a * // tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1847:184a-2: rigs su skyes pa 'ba' zhig gis 'grub pa ma yin gyi rigs dma' bas kyang ngo //
T02D1847:184a-3: gang gis kyang mi 'grub ce na /
T02D1847:184a-5: snying nas slob dpon smod pa zhes te /
T02D1847:184a-6: dam chos klog pa sbyin pa dang //
T02D1847:184a-7: 'chad byed gdams ngag ston pa dang //
T02D1847:184a-8: dbang bskur ba dang las byed pa //
T02D1847:184a-9: de rnams slob dpon zhes gsungs so //
T02D1847:184a-11: de bas na 'dir ni bla ma nyid slob dpon yig sgras gsungs so //
T02D1847:184a-12: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:184a-13: nges par bstan par yang dag sbyor ;
T02D1847:184a-14: / gzhan rnams dag ni spyod la 'dzud //
T02D1847:184a-15: slob ma slob dpon sgra yis ni /
T02D1847:184a-16: mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag bstan //
T02D1847:184a-18: de la smod pa lhur byed pa ni /
T02D1847:184a-19: brnyas pa la sogs pa byed pa ste /
T02D1847:184a-20: de rang gi rgyud la shin tu snod dang mi ldan par byas pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1847:184a-21: bla ma ni phan 'dogs pa'i zhing dang /
T02D1847:184a-22: yon tan gyi zhing nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1847:184a-23: gang snang ba rdo rje 'char ba la sogs pa /
T02D1847:184a-24: mi shes pa yi rab rib ni //
T02D1847:184a-25: ye shes spyan gyis rnam par sbyong //
T02D1847:184a-26: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
T02D1847:184a-27: bla ma dge 'dun bla ma pha //
T02D1847:184a-28: chos kyi sbyin bdag gtso bo ste //
T02D1847:184a-29: yid bzhin nor bu bla na med //
T02D1847:184a-31: sdig pa chen po byed pa bsal bar bya ba'i
T02D1847:184a-32: phyir gsungs pa srog gcod pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1847:184a-33: sogs pa la / gsad pa'i bsam pas srog chags
T02D1847:184a-34: rnams kyi tshe med par byed pa ni srog gcod
T02D1847:184a-35: sogs pa la / pa'o // gzhan slu ba'i bsam
T02D1847:184a-36: pas ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po'i tshig go ba
T02D1847:184a-37: rnams la gzhan du ston par byed pa ni brdzun
T02D1847:184a-38: sogs pa la / pa'o // du smra ba'o //
T02D1847:184a-39: gzhan gyi rdzas su shes pas rku ba'i blos brkus
T02D1847:184a-40: sogs pa la / pa'o // du smra ba'o //
T02D1847:184a-41: te / gzhan gyi rdzas la mngon par dga' ba
T02D1847:184a-42: ni ma byin par len pa'o //
T02D1847:184a-43: yul la shin tu chags pa'i sems kyis rtag tu 'dod pa lhur byed pa'o //
T02D1847:184a-45: thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes dang ldan pa
T02D1847:184a-46: gzhan la phan pa lhur byed pas mi dge ba
T02D1847:184a-47: bcu'i las kyi lam yang cho ga bzhin du bstan
T02D1847:184a-48: par bya'o // de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:184b-0: dug gis dug ni @184b sel bar byed //
T02D1847:184b-1: sman pas ji ltar bstan pa ltar //
T02D1847:184b-2: bya ba ru ni thub pas gsungs //
T02D1847:184b-3: sdug bsngal yin yang gzhan phan la //
T02D1847:184b-4: gang la dug ni phan gyur na //
T02D1847:184b-5: de la dug ni spyin par bya //
T02D1847:184b-6: gang la phan par mi 'gyur na //
T02D1847:184b-7: de la mchog kyang sbyin mi bya //
T02D1847:184b-9: des na byed pa la ngan song mi srid de /
T02D1847:184b-10: phan pa'i bsam pa yin pa'i phyir sman pa nyid
T02D1847:184b-11: zug rngu sel bar byed pa la sogs pa bzhin
T02D1847:184b-13: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
T02D1847:184b-14: snying rjer ldan pas brtse bar bya //
T02D1847:184b-16: bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:184b-17: bshang ba dang gci ba dag kha zas su byed pa ni /
T02D1847:184b-18: bya ba ste thabs yin pa'i phyir gang rnams kyi
T02D1847:184b-19: don du bshang ba dang gci ba zas su byed
T02D1847:184b-20: pa ste / bza' ba dang mi bza' ba'i spyod pas stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:184b-22: rnam par rtog pa las ma gtogs pa'i mi gtsang
T02D1847:184b-23: ba la sogs pa gzhan cung zad yod pa ma
T02D1847:184b-24: yin no // des na 'dod pa dang mi 'dod
T02D1847:184b-25: pa'i kha zas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
T02D1847:184b-26: yin no // blos / rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub
T02D1847:184b-27: pa'i skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o
T02D1847:184b-28: yin no // blos / // de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:184b-29: rang bzhin gyis ni yongs su dag pa'i dngos //
T02D1847:184b-30: 'dod dang mi 'dod rnal 'byor bas mi brtag / kun du rtog las skyes pa 'di dag ni //
T02D1847:184b-31: dngos pos ma brtags gcig pu nyams dga' ba'o //
T02D1847:184b-33: thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
T02D1847:184b-34: ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:184b-35: gal te 'di rnams dam tshig dad sdom ba la
T02D1847:184b-36: gnas pa thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes la
T02D1847:184b-37: mkhas pas de'i tshe de rnams dang lhan cig tu
T02D1847:184b-38: rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad kyang nyes pa yod pa
T02D1847:184b-39: ma yin te / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1847:184b-40: kyi rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad bor
T02D1847:184b-41: ma yin te / ba'i phyir ro // de yang gsungs pa ;
T02D1847:184b-42: gang dang gang gis bcings pa yis //
T02D1847:184b-43: drag pa'i las kyi skye bo rnams //
T02D1847:184b-44: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02D1847:184b-47: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid las kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:184b-48: thabs dang shes rab mngon ldan pa'i //
T02D1847:185a-1: tshig nga yis bstan pa yin //
T02D1847:185a-2: gzhan du'ang rab tu byed pas na //
T02D1847:185a-3: de nyid bgrod byar 'dod ma yin //
T02D1847:185a-5: zla gsang thig le las kyang gsungs pa //
T02D1847:185a-6: thabs dang shes rab sems kyis ni //
T02D1847:185a-7: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02D1847:185a-8: rtag tu dogs pa med gyur pas //
T02D1847:185a-9: 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya //
T02D1847:185a-11: 'gal ba'i spyod pa 'di la ngan song du 'gro
T02D1847:185a-12: ba'i nus pa med de bstan pa'i dus byas pa'i
T02D1847:185a-13: khyad par las gzhan du byas pas sngags la sogs
T02D1847:185a-14: pas nye bar sbyangs pa'i dug gi nus pa rlag
T02D1847:185a-17: mkhas pas sdig pa chen po byas kyang rnam smin myur du 'byang //
T02D1847:185a-18: mi mkhas sdig chung byas kyang 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02D1847:185a-19: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'gro //
T02D1847:185a-20: de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur //
T02D1847:185a-22: 'di dag kyang legs par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:185a-23: dge slong tshur shog ces bzhi sngags pas 'grub pa //
T02D1847:185a-24: de nyid mthong ba'i stobs las rtogs par bya //
T02D1847:185a-25: bsam gyis mi khyab gyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos //
T02D1847:185a-26: gser 'gyur rtsi lcags gser du 'gro ba bzhin //
T02D1847:185a-27: sangs rgyas yum zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:185a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
T02D1847:185a-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yum zhes bya ba'i tshig las te /
T02D1847:185a-30: de yang gsal bar ma bshad do //
T02D1847:185a-31: de lta bu'i las byed pa ci'i phyir sdig pa
T02D1847:185a-32: ma yin zhing sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1847:185a-34: de'i don ni rnam par mi rtog blo can zhes
T02D1847:185a-35: bya ba ni ma la sogs pa'i rtog pa dang
T02D1847:185a-36: bral bas so // de ltar na phyugs la sogs
T02D1847:185a-37: pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam
T02D1847:185a-40: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa des na /
T02D1847:185a-41: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa 'di nyid la rjes su gnang ba yin gyi /
T02D1847:185a-42: gzhan rnams la ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1847:185a-43: yang na sems can rnams gzhug par bya ba'i dgongs pas 'di gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:185a-44: 'di'i don ni gtum po ni zhe sdang mang po rnams so //
T02D1847:185a-45: ma ni len pa ste ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1847:185a-46: rang gi rigs las skyes pa nyid du 'dzin pas
T02D1847:185b-1: de nyid smyig ma mkhan te rang gi rigs skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:185b-2: sogs pa'i sgras rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D1847:185b-3: gsod pa ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1847:185b-4: sems can du lta ba la sogs pa 'dzoms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:185b-5: de nyid don yin te blang bar bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:185b-6: de na don te sems can rnams rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D1847:185b-7: chub kyi lam la 'jug par bye dpas mtshan nyid
T02D1847:185b-8: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:185b-9: mtshams med lnga zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:185b-10: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga ni mtshams med pa lnga'o //
T02D1847:185b-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mtshams med par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:185b-12: sogs pa'i sgras ni dam tshig la sogs pa skyong ba dang /
T02D1847:185b-13: sbyin la la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D1847:185b-14: sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //
T02D1847:185b-15: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1847:185b-16: mthong ba'i chos thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa'o
T02D1847:185b-17: // srog gcod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:185b-18: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas
T02D1847:185b-19: phung po rnams la mngon par chags pa med pa'o
T02D1847:185b-20: // sems can zhes bya ba chags par brjod de ming dang gzugs la chags pa'o //
T02D1847:185b-21: brdzun du smra ba dga' ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1847:185b-22: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes goms pas chos thams
T02D1847:185b-23: cad dngos po med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba

T02D1847:189a-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gnas //
T02D1847:189a-12: mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis //
T02D1847:189a-13: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa dang /

T02D1847:189a-15: 'dis ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:189a-16: sbyor ba dang po tsam sgom pa pos kyang gsang ba dang //
T02D1847:189a-17: cig shos kyi mchod pa byas nas bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1847:189a-22: sngags ni sngags zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D1847:189a-23: de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o //
T02D1847:189a-24: zhes bya ba'i tshig las so //
T02D1847:189a-25: dpal bde ba rtogs pa las kyang gsungs pa /

T02D1847:189a-27: mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
T02D1847:189a-28: gsang ba'i don ni rtogs byed pas //
T02D1847:189a-29: 'dis na sngags zhes bya bar brjod //

T02D1847:189a-32: du lus dang ngag dang yid la zhes rkyen 'khrugs
T02D1847:189a-33: pas gsum pa'i don la bdun pa ste yid kyis

T02D1847:189a-36: kyang ngo // pa'o // bsgrub par bya ba ni

T02D1847:189a-38: kyang ngo // pa'o // // yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis //
T02D1847:189a-39: zhes pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //

T02D1847:189a-41: sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1847:189a-43: sems la dmigs pa bzhin bdag med pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1847:189a-44: gang yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:189a-45: ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1847:189b-0: dbyibs la sogs pa med @189b pa'i phyir ngag dang lus kyang rang rig pa tsam gyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1847:189b-1: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //
T02D1847:189b-2: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa de
T02D1847:189b-3: bzhin nyid de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de la

T02D1847:189b-5: bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje
T02D1847:189b-6: la sogs pa gsum yang dag par sbyor ba ste

T02D1847:189b-10: gang gi phyir lus la sogs pa sku rdo rje
T02D1847:189b-11: la sogs pa'i ngo bor brtags pa'i rang bzhin sku
T02D1847:189b-12: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de kho na nyid ma

T02D1847:189b-16: sbyor ba ste thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug

T02D1847:189b-19: byang chub pa ma yin te ;

T02D1847:189b-25: 'di ni sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes te //
T02D1847:189b-26: 'di rtogs pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin //

T02D1847:189b-30: 'dod chags la sogs nyes dri bral //
T02D1847:189b-31: bzung 'dzin med pa'i sems dpa' mchog / de nyid myang 'das go 'phang brjod //

T02D1847:189b-34: ma yin pa des na 'bras bu la dmigs pa

T02D1847:189b-41: sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sngags las byung bar bsgom par bya'o zhes kha cig go //

T02D1847:189b-45: pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis so //

T02D1847:190a-5: de lta na yang blo yis tha dad par bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /

T02D1847:190a-19: rtag pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //

T02D1847:190a-21: byang chub med cing sgom pa med pa ni de'i

T02D1847:190a-25: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D1847:190a-26: zhes bya bar kha cig 'chad de /
T02D1847:190a-27: de ltar na 'di'i don ni lan gnyis su bzlas par 'gyur te /
T02D1847:190a-28: gang gi phyir 'di'i don bcu pa las /
T02D1847:190a-29: rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms pa yis //
T02D1847:190a-30: zhes bya bas drag shul sgrub par byed pa zhes bya bas 'chad pa na ston to //
T02D1847:190a-31: phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas sems brtan cing ting

T02D1847:190a-34: 'byor sgom pa'i rim pa gsungs pa /

T02D1847:190a-37: bcom ldan 'das ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du gsungs
T02D1847:190a-38: so // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1847:190a-39: zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi nang du chud

T02D1847:190b-10: ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:190b-11: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1847:190b-15: ces bya ba'i tshig las so //

T02D1847:190b-17: gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin par sgom pa ste lhag

T02D1847:190b-26: kyis rig ma'i padma'i nang du gzhug par byas la
T02D1847:190b-27: bcug ste / / de'i padma'i sna'i rtse mor rin
T02D1847:190b-28: po che kha dog sna lnga pa dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D1847:190b-29: thig le yungs kar tsam gyi nang du gcig bu'am
T02D1847:190b-31: rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D1847:190b-32: chen po dga' ba skyed pa'i cho gas gnas par

T02D1847:190b-35: dga' ba'i thig le rang gi mtshan ma'i nang du
T02D1847:190b-36: bsam par bya zhes kha cig zer ro //
T02D1847:190b-37: da ni rigs kyi dbye bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1847:190b-38: bstan pa'i phyir re zhig lha'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa

T02D1847:190b-45: rdo rje sems dpa'i yang sa bon de nyid do //
T02D1847:190b-46: gang yang gsungs pa bco lnga pa las /
T02D1847:191a-2: rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom //
T02D1847:191a-3: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ni //
T02D1847:191a-4: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par bshad //
T02D1847:191a-6: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste thams cad rang
T02D1847:191a-7: gi gdan la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon blta
T02D1847:191a-8: bar bya'o // 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1847:191a-9: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la //
T02D1847:191a-10: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang mtshan ma la
T02D1847:191a-11: sogs pa rnams kyis spyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas
T02D1847:191a-12: rang snang ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bdag
T02D1847:191a-14: sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1847:191a-15: rdo rje padma rnam par bsgom //
T02D1847:191a-16: zhes pa ni g-yas g-yon du gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1847:191a-17: 'di ni snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1847:191a-18: dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:191a-19: bsnyen pa la sogs pa nas rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o //
T02D1847:191a-20: 'di yang snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis kar sbyar ro //
T02D1847:191a-22: zhes bya ba ni dmar po dri ma med pa ste /
T02D1847:191a-23: 'di yang lha thams cad kyi rang gi kha dog nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1847:191a-24: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1847:191a-25: sangs rgyas go 'phang spro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:191a-26: rang snang ba'i chu skyes bu dkyil 'khor sprul zhes
T02D1847:191a-27: bya ba'i don du cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas
T02D1847:191a-28: rnams sa bon las bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1847:191a-29: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba zhu ba las yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:191a-30: 'khor ni khyad par zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:191a-31: sa bon de las dkyil 'khor pa mtha' dag gi
T02D1847:191a-32: lha'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa bsgom par bya zhes
T02D1847:191a-34: 'di ni snga ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1847:191a-35: de ltar na dang po'i sbyor ba rnam par bsgom par byas nas /
T02D1847:191a-36: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa sngon du song
T02D1847:191a-37: bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ba gsungs
T02D1847:191a-38: pa / sngon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:191a-39: nas kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya ba ni chu zheng nas kyi tshad do //
T02D1847:191a-40: 'khor lo la sogs pa khyad par du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1847:191a-41: mtshan ma zlum po rnams padma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
T02D1847:191a-42: ring po rnams ni rdo rje bzhin no //
T02D1847:191b-0: @191b dngos grub ni byang chub kyi rgyu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1847:191b-1: de ji lta bur gyur pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:191b-2: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:191b-3: dngos grub thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1847:191b-4: de nyid yon tan te goms par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:191b-5: de rnams kyi gzhi ni gnas so //
T02D1847:191b-6: de bsgoms pa'i stobs las phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:191b-8: de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:191b-9: de la sogs pa gang cung zad //
T02D1847:191b-10: mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1847:191b-11: de dag thams cad brtan pa yin //
T02D1847:191b-12: ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa'o zhes so //
T02D1847:191b-13: spro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mtshan ma
T02D1847:191b-14: phra mo'i nang du dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya bar
T02D1847:191b-15: ston to // chos kyi gnas rnams rab tu spro //
T02D1847:191b-16: zhes pa ni chos thams cad de phung po dang /
T02D1847:191b-20: gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D1847:191b-21: 'byin pa ste spro bar bya zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1847:191b-22: to // 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1847:191b-23: phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtan pa'i mtshan ma thob nas
T02D1847:191b-24: de'i 'od zer las sprul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1847:191b-25: la sogs pa rnams spro bar bya zhes bya ba'o
T02D1847:191b-26: // da ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sngon du
T02D1847:191b-27: bsnyen pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de
T02D1847:191b-28: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:191b-29: thams cad de nyid don ston pa //
T02D1847:191b-30: zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam phyin ci ma log pa ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:191b-31: spyod pa kun mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1847:191b-33: spyod pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa'o //
T02D1847:191b-34: des rdzogs sangs rgyas te bla na med pa'i ye shes mngon du byed pa'o /
T02D1847:191b-35: 'dis ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs
T02D1847:191b-36: pa dang snying rje dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i
T02D1847:191b-38: de ston pa ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid yin par ston to //
T02D1847:191b-39: gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa //
T02D1847:191b-40: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun
T02D1847:191b-41: pa ji ltar rnyed pa'i yul gyis cho ga bzhin
T02D1847:191b-42: du mchod pa'o // shes rab can zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid rig pas so //
T02D1847:191b-43: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid mchod rten gyi zhes pa ni /
T02D1847:192a-0: @192a * // rigs gsum gyi spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi ji
T02D1847:192a-1: lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i mchod pa byas nas
T02D1847:192a-4: de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1847:192a-5: sku ni sku yi rang bzhin dang //
T02D1847:192a-6: thugs ni thugs kyi rang bzhin dang //
T02D1847:192a-7: gsung ni gsung gi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1847:192a-8: mchod pas mchod pa thob pa yin //
T02D1847:192a-10: dngos grub 'bras bu thob pa yis //
T02D1847:192a-11: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub 'bras bu don du gnyer ba'o //

T02D1847:192a-15: zas gzhan dag ni bza' mi bya //
T02D1847:192a-16: zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba thams cad

T02D1847:192a-20: ba'i don to // // de rnams kyi bya ba

T02D1847:192a-24: 'dir ldog par bya ba'i tha tshig go //

T02D1847:195b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sku mnyam pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02D1847:195b-12: de ji ltar bsgom pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:195b-13: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di'i don
T02D1847:195b-14: ni gsung rjes su dran pa la sogs pa la
T02D1847:195b-15: shes par bya'o // sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1847:195b-16: rnam par dag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:195b-17: sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1847:195b-18: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i rnam pas so //
T02D1847:195b-19: bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig / ces de
T02D1847:195b-20: bzhin du gyur zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi skur
T02D1847:195b-21: 'dod pa'o // gsung rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:195b-22: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:195b-23: chos 'dzin pa'i mchog ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1847:195b-25: chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig ngag spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa rnams te /
T02D1847:195b-26: nges pa'i tshig las nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1847:195b-27: thugs rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:195b-28: thugs rjes yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:195b-29: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
T02D1847:195b-30: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs
T02D1847:195b-31: pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1847:195b-32: // dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis na dbang po yang yin no //
T02D1847:195b-33: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1847:195b-35: sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi phun sum
T02D1847:195b-36: tshogs pa yang dag par steng bar bdag kyang gyur
T02D1847:195b-37: cig / ces nga rgyal byed pa'o //
T02D1847:196a-1: cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir du sems can rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:196a-2: gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:196a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rnams kyi thugs nam
T02D1847:196a-4: mkha' dang mtshungs par 'jug pa'i ngang tshul de dang
T02D1847:196a-5: 'dra bar bdag gi yang zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D1847:196a-6: // ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1847:196a-7: sems can kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:196a-8: sems can rnams kyi lus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D1847:196a-9: dpyad mi bzod pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med
T02D1847:196a-10: pa'i ye shes tsam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D1847:196a-11: // gang yang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1847:196a-12: de'i phyir sems can rnams de kho na nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1847:196a-13: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1847:196a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
T02D1847:196a-16: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gcig pa'i de
T02D1847:196a-17: bzhin nyid 'di la gnyis su med de /
T02D1847:196a-18: gnyis su sbyar med do zhes so //
T02D1847:196a-19: de ltar bdag kyang de 'drar gyur cig ces /
T02D1847:196a-20: sems can rjes su dran pa'o //
T02D1847:196a-21: yang na gang sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i
T02D1847:196a-22: sems lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dbye bas nye
T02D1847:196a-23: bar mtshon pa ni brtag pa ste /
T02D1847:196a-24: de nyid yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du
T02D1847:196a-25: rtog pa dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid ro gcig
T02D1847:196a-26: pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
T02D1847:196a-27: de'i phyir bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar thugs nam
T02D1847:196a-28: mkha' dang mnyam par rtogs par gyur cig ces bsams
T02D1847:196a-30: da ni de bzhin du gyur pa'i sku la sogs pa bstan pa'i don du /
T02D1847:196a-31: sngags kyi sgo nas rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
T02D1847:196a-32: sku gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1847:196a-33: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes ni sngags te /
T02D1847:196a-34: de nyid sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bos
T02D1847:196a-35: mi phyed pa'i rdo rje gang la yod pa de
T02D1847:196a-36: la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1847:196a-39: gsung gi sku yang rnam bsgoms pas //
T02D1847:196a-40: zhes bya ba ni rgyas bar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1847:196a-41: sngags kyi don sgom pa'i bzlas pas sku la sogs
T02D1847:196b-0: de'i ngo bo gzhan gyi sku gang yin pa gnyis su med pa'i @196b ye shes tsam du ste /
T02D1847:196b-1: de dang 'dra bar bdag gyur cig / ces smon lam btab nas bsgom par bya'o //
